59CreatureMovementData::CreatureMovementData() : Ground(CreatureGroundMovementType::Run), Flight(CreatureFlightMovementType::None),
60 Swim(true), Rooted(false), Chase(CreatureChaseMovementType::Run),
61 Random(CreatureRandomMovementType::Walk), InteractionPauseTimer(sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CREATURE_STOP_FOR_PLAYER)) {}
62
63std::string CreatureMovementData::ToString() const
64{
65 constexpr std::array<char const*, 3> GroundStates = {"None", "Run", "Hover"};
66 constexpr std::array<char const*, 3> FlightStates = {"None", "DisableGravity", "CanFly"};
67 constexpr std::array<char const*, 3> ChaseStates = {"Run", "CanWalk", "AlwaysWalk"};
68 constexpr std::array<char const*, 3> RandomStates = {"Walk", "CanRun", "AlwaysRun"};
69
70 std::ostringstream str;
71 str << std::boolalpha
72 << "Ground: " << GroundStates[AsUnderlyingType(Ground)]
73 << ", Swim: " << Swim
74 << ", Flight: " << FlightStates[AsUnderlyingType(Flight)]
75 << ", Chase: " << ChaseStates[AsUnderlyingType(Chase)]
76 << ", Random: " << RandomStates[AsUnderlyingType(Random)];
77 if (Rooted)
78 str << ", Rooted";
79 str << ", InteractionPauseTimer: " << InteractionPauseTimer;
80
81 return str.str();
82}
83
84TrainerSpell const* TrainerSpellData::Find(uint32 spell_id) const
85{
86 TrainerSpellMap::const_iterator itr = spellList.find(spell_id);
87 if (itr != spellList.end())
88 return &itr->second;
89
90 return nullptr;
91}
92
93bool VendorItemData::RemoveItem(uint32 item_id)
94{
95 bool found = false;
96 for (VendorItemList::iterator i = m_items.begin(); i != m_items.end();)
97 {
98 if ((*i)->item == item_id)
99 {
100 i = m_items.erase(i++);
101 found = true;
102 }
103 else
104 ++i;
105 }
106 return found;
107}
108
109VendorItemCount::VendorItemCount(uint32 _item, uint32 _count)
110 : itemId(_item), count(_count), lastIncrementTime(GameTime::GetGameTime().count()) { }
111
112VendorItem const* VendorItemData::FindItemCostPair(uint32 item_id, uint32 extendedCost) const
113{
114 for (VendorItemList::const_iterator i = m_items.begin(); i != m_items.end(); ++i)
115 if ((*i)->item == item_id && (*i)->ExtendedCost == extendedCost)
116 return *i;
117 return nullptr;
118}
119
120uint32 CreatureTemplate::GetRandomValidModelId() const
121{
122 uint8 c = 0;
123 uint32 modelIDs[4];
124
125 if (Modelid1) modelIDs[c++] = Modelid1;
126 if (Modelid2) modelIDs[c++] = Modelid2;
127 if (Modelid3) modelIDs[c++] = Modelid3;
128 if (Modelid4) modelIDs[c++] = Modelid4;
129
130 return ((c > 0) ? modelIDs[urand(0, c - 1)] : 0);
131}
132
133uint32 CreatureTemplate::GetFirstValidModelId() const
134{
135 if (Modelid1) return Modelid1;
136 if (Modelid2) return Modelid2;
137 if (Modelid3) return Modelid3;
138 if (Modelid4) return Modelid4;
139 return 0;
140}

142void CreatureTemplate::InitializeQueryData()
143{
144 queryData.Initialize(SMSG_CREATURE_QUERY_RESPONSE, 1);
145
146 queryData << uint32(Entry); // creature entry
147 queryData << Name;
148 queryData << uint8(0) << uint8(0) << uint8(0); // name2, name3, name4, always empty
149 queryData << SubName;
150 queryData << IconName; // "Directions" for guard, string for Icons 2.3.0
151 queryData << uint32(type_flags); // flags
152 queryData << uint32(type); // CreatureType.dbc
153 queryData << uint32(family); // CreatureFamily.dbc
154 queryData << uint32(rank); // Creature Rank (elite, boss, etc)
155 queryData << uint32(KillCredit[0]); // new in 3.1, kill credit
156 queryData << uint32(KillCredit[1]); // new in 3.1, kill credit
157 queryData << uint32(Modelid1); // Modelid1
158 queryData << uint32(Modelid2); // Modelid2
159 queryData << uint32(Modelid3); // Modelid3
160 queryData << uint32(Modelid4); // Modelid4
161 queryData << float(ModHealth); // dmg/hp modifier
162 queryData << float(ModMana); // dmg/mana modifier
163 queryData << uint8(RacialLeader);
164 queryData << uint32(movementId); // CreatureMovementInfo.dbc
165}

167bool AssistDelayEvent::Execute(uint64 /*e_time*/, uint32 /*p_time*/)
168{
169 if (Unit* victim = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_owner, m_victim))
170 {
171 // Initialize last damage timer if it doesn't exist
172 m_owner->SetLastDamagedTime(GameTime::GetGameTime().count() + MAX_AGGRO_RESET_TIME);
173
174 while (!m_assistants.empty())
175 {
176 Creature* assistant = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*m_owner, *m_assistants.begin());
177 m_assistants.pop_front();
178
179 if (assistant && assistant->CanAssistTo(m_owner, victim))
180 {
181 assistant->SetNoCallAssistance(true);
182 assistant->CombatStart(victim);
183 if (assistant->IsAIEnabled)
184 assistant->AI()->AttackStart(victim);
185
186 assistant->SetLastDamagedTimePtr(m_owner->GetLastDamagedTimePtr());
187 }
188 }
189 }
190 return true;
191}

198bool ForcedDespawnDelayEvent::Execute(uint64 /*e_time*/, uint32 /*p_time*/)
199{
200 m_owner.DespawnOrUnsummon(0s, m_respawnTimer); // since we are here, we are not TempSummon as object type cannot change during runtime
201 return true;
202}
203
204bool TemporaryThreatModifierEvent::Execute(uint64 /*e_time*/, uint32 /*p_time*/)
205{
206 if (Unit* victim = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(m_owner, m_threatVictimGUID))
207 {
208 if (m_owner.IsInCombatWith(victim))
209 {
210 m_owner.GetThreatMgr().ModifyThreatByPercent(victim, -100); // Reset threat to zero.
211 m_owner.GetThreatMgr().AddThreat(victim, m_threatValue); // Set to the previous value it had, first before modification.
212 }
213 }
214
215 return true;
216}

257void Creature::AddToWorld()
258{
260 if (!IsInWorld())
261 {
262 // pussywizard: motion master needs to be initialized before OnCreatureCreate, which may set death state to JUST_DIED, to prevent crash
263 // it's also initialized in AIM_Initialize(), few lines below, but it's not a problem
264 Motion_Initialize();
265
266 GetMap()->GetObjectsStore().Insert<Creature>(GetGUID(), this);
267 if (m_spawnId)
268 {
269 GetMap()->GetCreatureBySpawnIdStore().insert(std::make_pair(m_spawnId, this));
270 }
271 Unit::AddToWorld();
272
273 SearchFormation();
274
275 AIM_Initialize();
276
277 if (IsVehicle())
278 {
279 GetVehicleKit()->Install();
280 }
281
282 if (GetZoneScript())
283 {
284 GetZoneScript()->OnCreatureCreate(this);
285 }
286
287 loot.sourceWorldObjectGUID = GetGUID();
288
289 sScriptMgr->OnCreatureAddWorld(this);
290 }
291}
292
293void Creature::RemoveFromWorld()
294{
295 if (IsInWorld())
296 {
297 sScriptMgr->OnCreatureRemoveWorld(this);
298
299 if (GetZoneScript())
300 GetZoneScript()->OnCreatureRemove(this);
301
302 if (m_formation)
303 sFormationMgr->RemoveCreatureFromGroup(m_formation, this);
304
305 if (Transport* transport = GetTransport())
306 transport->RemovePassenger(this, true);
307
308 Unit::RemoveFromWorld();
309
310 if (m_spawnId)
311 Acore::Containers::MultimapErasePair(GetMap()->GetCreatureBySpawnIdStore(), m_spawnId, this);
312
313 GetMap()->GetObjectsStore().Remove<Creature>(GetGUID());
314 }
315}
316
317void Creature::DisappearAndDie()
318{
319 DestroyForNearbyPlayers();
320 //SetVisibility(VISIBILITY_OFF);
321 //ObjectAccessor::UpdateObjectVisibility(this);
322 if (IsAlive())
323 setDeathState(JUST_DIED, true);
324 RemoveCorpse(false, true);
325}
326
327void Creature::SearchFormation()
328{
329 if (IsSummon())
330 {
331 return;
332 }
333
334 ObjectGuid::LowType spawnId = GetSpawnId();
335 if (!spawnId)
336 {
337 return;
338 }
339
340 CreatureGroupInfoType::const_iterator frmdata = sFormationMgr->CreatureGroupMap.find(spawnId);
341 if (frmdata != sFormationMgr->CreatureGroupMap.end())
342 {
343 sFormationMgr->AddCreatureToGroup(frmdata->second.leaderGUID, this);
344 }
345}
346
347void Creature::RemoveCorpse(bool setSpawnTime, bool skipVisibility)
348{
349 if (getDeathState() != CORPSE)
350 return;
351
352 m_corpseRemoveTime = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
353 setDeathState(DEAD);
354 RemoveAllAuras();
355 if (!skipVisibility) // pussywizard
356 DestroyForNearbyPlayers(); // pussywizard: previous UpdateObjectVisibility()
357 loot.clear();
358 uint32 respawnDelay = m_respawnDelay;
359 if (IsAIEnabled)
360 AI()->CorpseRemoved(respawnDelay);
361
362 // Should get removed later, just keep "compatibility" with scripts
363 if (setSpawnTime)
364 {
365 m_respawnTime = GameTime::GetGameTime().count() + respawnDelay;
366 //SaveRespawnTime();
367 }
368
369 float x, y, z, o;
370 GetRespawnPosition(x, y, z, &o);
371 SetHomePosition(x, y, z, o);
372 SetPosition(x, y, z, o);
373
374 // xinef: relocate notifier
375 m_last_notify_position.Relocate(-5000.0f, -5000.0f, -5000.0f, 0.0f);
376
377 // pussywizard: if corpse was removed during falling then the falling will continue after respawn, so stop falling is such case
378 if (IsFalling())
379 StopMoving();
380}
381
385bool Creature::InitEntry(uint32 Entry, const CreatureData* data)
386{
387 CreatureTemplate const* normalInfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(Entry);
388 if (!normalInfo)
389 {
390 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature::InitEntry creature entry {} does not exist.", Entry);
391 return false;
392 }
393
394 // get difficulty 1 mode entry
395 // Xinef: Skip for pets!
396 CreatureTemplate const* cinfo = normalInfo;
397 for (uint8 diff = uint8(GetMap()->GetSpawnMode()); diff > 0 && !IsPet();)
398 {
399 // we already have valid Map pointer for current creature!
400 if (normalInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff - 1])
401 {
402 cinfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(normalInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff - 1]);
403 if (cinfo)
404 break; // template found
405
406 // check and reported at startup, so just ignore (restore normalInfo)
407 cinfo = normalInfo;
408 }
409
410 // for instances heroic to normal, other cases attempt to retrieve previous difficulty
411 if (diff >= RAID_DIFFICULTY_10MAN_HEROIC && GetMap()->IsRaid())
412 diff -= 2; // to normal raid difficulty cases
413 else
414 --diff;
415 }
416
417 SetEntry(Entry); // normal entry always
418 m_creatureInfo = cinfo; // map mode related always
419
420 // equal to player Race field, but creature does not have race
421 SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, 0, 0);
422
423 // known valid are: CLASS_WARRIOR, CLASS_PALADIN, CLASS_ROGUE, CLASS_MAGE
424 SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, 1, uint8(cinfo->unit_class));
425
426 // Cancel load if no model defined
427 if (!(cinfo->GetFirstValidModelId()))
428 {
429 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature (Entry: {}) has no model defined in table `creature_template`, can't load. ", Entry);
430 return false;
431 }
432
433 uint32 displayID = ObjectMgr::ChooseDisplayId(GetCreatureTemplate(), data);
434 if (!sObjectMgr->GetCreatureModelRandomGender(&displayID)) // Cancel load if no model defined
435 {
436 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature (Entry: {}) has no model defined in table `creature_template`, can't load. ", Entry);
437 return false;
438 }
439
440 SetDisplayId(displayID);
441 SetNativeDisplayId(displayID);
442
443 // Load creature equipment
444 if (!data)
445 {
446 LoadEquipment(); // use default from the template
447 }
448 else if (data->equipmentId == 0)
449 {
450 LoadEquipment(0); // 0 means no equipment for creature table
451 }
452 else
453 {
454 m_originalEquipmentId = data->equipmentId;
455 LoadEquipment(data->equipmentId);
456 }
457
458 SetName(normalInfo->Name); // at normal entry always
459
460 SetFloatValue(UNIT_MOD_CAST_SPEED, 1.0f);
461
462 float runSpeed = cinfo->speed_run;
463 if (Pet* pet = ToPet())
464 {
465 if (pet->isControlled() && pet->GetOwnerGUID().IsPlayer())
466 {
467 runSpeed = 1.15f;
468 }
469 }
470
471 SetSpeed(MOVE_WALK, cinfo->speed_walk);
472 SetSpeed(MOVE_RUN, runSpeed);
473 SetSpeed(MOVE_SWIM, cinfo->speed_swim);
474 SetSpeed(MOVE_FLIGHT, cinfo->speed_flight);
475
476 // Will set UNIT_FIELD_BOUNDINGRADIUS and UNIT_FIELD_COMBATREACH
477 SetObjectScale(cinfo->scale);
478
479 SetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_HOVERHEIGHT, cinfo->HoverHeight);
480
481 // checked at loading
482 m_defaultMovementType = MovementGeneratorType(cinfo->MovementType);
483 if (!m_wanderDistance && m_defaultMovementType == RANDOM_MOTION_TYPE)
484 m_defaultMovementType = IDLE_MOTION_TYPE;
485
486 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_CREATURE_SPELLS; ++i)
487 m_spells[i] = GetCreatureTemplate()->spells[i];
488
489 return true;
490}
491
492bool Creature::UpdateEntry(uint32 Entry, const CreatureData* data, bool changelevel, bool updateAI)
493{
494 if (!InitEntry(Entry, data))
495 return false;
496
497 CreatureTemplate const* cInfo = GetCreatureTemplate();
498
499 m_regenHealth = cInfo->RegenHealth;
500
501 // creatures always have melee weapon ready if any unless specified otherwise
502 if (!GetCreatureAddon())
503 SetSheath(SHEATH_STATE_MELEE);
504
505 SetFaction(cInfo->faction);
506
507 uint32 npcflag, unit_flags, dynamicflags;
508 ObjectMgr::ChooseCreatureFlags(cInfo, npcflag, unit_flags, dynamicflags, data);
509
510 if (cInfo->flags_extra & CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_WORLDEVENT)
511 ReplaceAllNpcFlags(NPCFlags(npcflag | sGameEventMgr->GetNPCFlag(this)));
512 else
513 ReplaceAllNpcFlags(NPCFlags(npcflag));
514
515 // Xinef: NPC is in combat, keep this flag!
516 unit_flags &= ~UNIT_FLAG_IN_COMBAT;
517 if (IsInCombat())
518 unit_flags |= UNIT_FLAG_IN_COMBAT;
519
520 ReplaceAllUnitFlags(UnitFlags(unit_flags));
521 ReplaceAllUnitFlags2(UnitFlags2(cInfo->unit_flags2));
522
523 ReplaceAllDynamicFlags(dynamicflags);
524
525 SetAttackTime(BASE_ATTACK, cInfo->BaseAttackTime);
526 SetAttackTime(OFF_ATTACK, cInfo->BaseAttackTime);
527 SetAttackTime(RANGED_ATTACK, cInfo->RangeAttackTime);
528
529 uint32 previousHealth = GetHealth();
530 uint32 previousMaxHealth = GetMaxHealth();
531 uint32 previousPlayerDamageReq = _playerDamageReq;
532
533 SelectLevel(changelevel);
534 if (previousHealth > 0)
535 {
536 SetHealth(previousHealth);
537
538 if (previousMaxHealth && previousMaxHealth > GetMaxHealth())
539 {
540 _playerDamageReq = (uint32)(previousPlayerDamageReq * GetMaxHealth() / previousMaxHealth);
541 }
542 else
543 {
544 _playerDamageReq = previousPlayerDamageReq;
545 }
546 }
547
548 SetMeleeDamageSchool(SpellSchools(cInfo->dmgschool));
549 CreatureBaseStats const* stats = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureBaseStats(getLevel(), cInfo->unit_class);
550 float armor = (float)stats->GenerateArmor(cInfo); // TODO: Why is this treated as uint32 when it's a float?
551 SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_ARMOR, BASE_VALUE, armor);
552 SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_HOLY, BASE_VALUE, float(cInfo->resistance[SPELL_SCHOOL_HOLY]));
553 SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_FIRE, BASE_VALUE, float(cInfo->resistance[SPELL_SCHOOL_FIRE]));
554 SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_NATURE, BASE_VALUE, float(cInfo->resistance[SPELL_SCHOOL_NATURE]));
555 SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_FROST, BASE_VALUE, float(cInfo->resistance[SPELL_SCHOOL_FROST]));
556 SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_SHADOW, BASE_VALUE, float(cInfo->resistance[SPELL_SCHOOL_SHADOW]));
557 SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_ARCANE, BASE_VALUE, float(cInfo->resistance[SPELL_SCHOOL_ARCANE]));
558
559 SetCanModifyStats(true);
560 UpdateAllStats();
561
562 // checked and error show at loading templates
563 if (FactionTemplateEntry const* factionTemplate = sFactionTemplateStore.LookupEntry(cInfo->faction))
564 {
565 if (factionTemplate->factionFlags & FACTION_TEMPLATE_FLAG_ASSIST_PLAYERS)
566 SetPvP(true);
567 else
568 SetPvP(false);
569 }
570
571 // updates spell bars for vehicles and set player's faction - should be called here, to overwrite faction that is set from the new template
572 if (IsVehicle())
573 {
574 if (Player* owner = Creature::GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself()) // this check comes in case we don't have a player
575 {
576 SetFaction(owner->GetFaction()); // vehicles should have same as owner faction
577 owner->VehicleSpellInitialize();
578 }
579 }
580
581 // trigger creature is always not selectable and can not be attacked
582 if (IsTrigger())
583 SetUnitFlag(UNIT_FLAG_NOT_SELECTABLE);
584
585 InitializeReactState();
586
587 if (!IsPet() && cInfo->flags_extra & CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_NO_TAUNT)
588 {
589 ApplySpellImmune(0, IMMUNITY_STATE, SPELL_AURA_MOD_TAUNT, true);
590 ApplySpellImmune(0, IMMUNITY_EFFECT, SPELL_EFFECT_ATTACK_ME, true);
591 }
592
593 if (GetMovementTemplate().IsRooted())
594 {
595 SetControlled(true, UNIT_STATE_ROOT);
596 }
597
598 SetDetectionDistance(cInfo->detection_range);
599
600 LoadSpellTemplateImmunity();
601
602 if (updateAI)
603 {
604 AIM_Initialize();
605 }
606
607 return true;
608}
609
610void Creature::Update(uint32 diff)
611{
612 if (IsAIEnabled && TriggerJustRespawned)
613 {
614 TriggerJustRespawned = false;
615 AI()->JustRespawned();
616 if (m_vehicleKit)
617 m_vehicleKit->Reset();
618 }
619
620 switch (m_deathState)
621 {
622 case JUST_RESPAWNED:
623 // Must not be called, see Creature::setDeathState JUST_RESPAWNED -> ALIVE promoting.
624 LOG_ERROR("entities.unit", "Creature ({}) in wrong state: JUST_RESPAWNED (4)", GetGUID().ToString());
625 break;
626 case JUST_DIED:
627 // Must not be called, see Creature::setDeathState JUST_DIED -> CORPSE promoting.
628 LOG_ERROR("entities.unit", "Creature ({}) in wrong state: JUST_DEAD (1)", GetGUID().ToString());
629 break;
630 case DEAD:
631 {
632 time_t now = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
633 if (m_respawnTime <= now)
634 {
635
636 ConditionList conditions = sConditionMgr->GetConditionsForNotGroupedEntry(CONDITION_SOURCE_TYPE_CREATURE_RESPAWN, GetEntry());
637
638 if (!sConditionMgr->IsObjectMeetToConditions(this, conditions))
639 {
640 // Creature should not respawn, reset respawn timer. Conditions will be checked again the next time it tries to respawn.
641 m_respawnTime = GameTime::GetGameTime().count() + m_respawnDelay;
642 break;
643 }
644
645 bool allowed = !IsAIEnabled || AI()->CanRespawn(); // First check if there are any scripts that prevent us respawning
646 if (!allowed) // Will be rechecked on next Update call
647 break;
648
649 ObjectGuid dbtableHighGuid = ObjectGuid::Create<HighGuid::Unit>(m_creatureData ? m_creatureData->id1 : GetEntry(), m_spawnId);
650 time_t linkedRespawntime = GetMap()->GetLinkedRespawnTime(dbtableHighGuid);
651 if (!linkedRespawntime) // Can respawn
652 Respawn();
653 else // the master is dead
654 {
655 ObjectGuid targetGuid = sObjectMgr->GetLinkedRespawnGuid(dbtableHighGuid);
656 if (targetGuid == dbtableHighGuid) // if linking self, never respawn (check delayed to next day)
657 SetRespawnTime(DAY);
658 else
659 m_respawnTime = (now > linkedRespawntime ? now : linkedRespawntime) + urand(5, MINUTE); // else copy time from master and add a little
660 SaveRespawnTime(); // also save to DB immediately
661 }
662 }
663 break;
664 }
665 case CORPSE:
666 {
667 Unit::Update(diff);
668 // deathstate changed on spells update, prevent problems
669 if (m_deathState != CORPSE)
670 break;
671
672 if (m_groupLootTimer && lootingGroupLowGUID)
673 {
674 if (m_groupLootTimer <= diff)
675 {
676 Group* group = sGroupMgr->GetGroupByGUID(lootingGroupLowGUID);
677 if (group)
678 group->EndRoll(&loot, GetMap());
679 m_groupLootTimer = 0;
680 lootingGroupLowGUID = 0;
681 }
682 else
683 {
684 m_groupLootTimer -= diff;
685 }
686 }
687 else if (m_corpseRemoveTime <= GameTime::GetGameTime().count())
688 {
689 RemoveCorpse(false);
690 LOG_DEBUG("entities.unit", "Removing corpse... {} ", GetUInt32Value(OBJECT_FIELD_ENTRY));
691 }
692 break;
693 }
694 case ALIVE:
695 {
696 Unit::Update(diff);
697
698 // creature can be dead after Unit::Update call
699 // CORPSE/DEAD state will processed at next tick (in other case death timer will be updated unexpectedly)
700 if (!IsAlive())
701 break;
702
703 // if creature is charmed, switch to charmed AI
704 if (NeedChangeAI)
705 {
706 UpdateCharmAI();
707 NeedChangeAI = false;
708 IsAIEnabled = true;
709
710 // xinef: update combat state, if npc is not in combat - return to spawn correctly by calling EnterEvadeMode
711 SelectVictim();
712 }
713
714 // periodic check to see if the creature has passed an evade boundary
715 if (IsAIEnabled && !IsInEvadeMode() && IsEngaged())
716 {
717 if (diff >= m_boundaryCheckTime)
718 {
719 AI()->CheckInRoom();
720 m_boundaryCheckTime = 2500;
721 }
722 else
723 m_boundaryCheckTime -= diff;
724 }
725
726 Unit* owner = GetCharmerOrOwner();
727 if (IsCharmed() && !IsWithinDistInMap(owner, GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange(), true, false))
728 {
729 RemoveCharmAuras();
730 }
731
732 if (Unit* victim = GetVictim())
733 {
734 // If we are closer than 50% of the combat reach we are going to reposition the victim
735 if (diff >= m_moveBackwardsMovementTime)
736 {
737 float MaxRange = GetCollisionRadius() + GetVictim()->GetCollisionRadius();
738
739 if (IsInDist(victim, MaxRange))
740 AI()->MoveBackwardsChecks();
741
742 m_moveBackwardsMovementTime = urand(MOVE_BACKWARDS_CHECK_INTERVAL, MOVE_BACKWARDS_CHECK_INTERVAL * 3);
743 }
744 else
745 {
746 m_moveBackwardsMovementTime -= diff;
747 }
748
749 // Circling the target
750 if (diff >= m_moveCircleMovementTime)
751 {
752 AI()->MoveCircleChecks();
753 m_moveCircleMovementTime = urand(MOVE_CIRCLE_CHECK_INTERVAL, MOVE_CIRCLE_CHECK_INTERVAL * 2);
754 }
755 else
756 {
757 m_moveCircleMovementTime -= diff;
758 }
759 }
760
761 // Call for assistance if not disabled
762 if (m_assistanceTimer)
763 {
764 if (m_assistanceTimer <= diff)
765 {
766 if (CanPeriodicallyCallForAssistance())
767 {
768 SetNoCallAssistance(false);
769 CallAssistance();
770 }
771 m_assistanceTimer = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CREATURE_FAMILY_ASSISTANCE_PERIOD);
772 }
773 else
774 {
775 m_assistanceTimer -= diff;
776 }
777 }
778
779 if (!IsInEvadeMode() && IsAIEnabled)
780 {
781 // do not allow the AI to be changed during update
782 m_AI_locked = true;
783 i_AI->UpdateAI(diff);
784 m_AI_locked = false;
785 }
786
787 // creature can be dead after UpdateAI call
788 // CORPSE/DEAD state will processed at next tick (in other case death timer will be updated unexpectedly)
789 if (!IsAlive())
790 break;
791
792 m_regenTimer -= diff;
793 if (m_regenTimer <= 0)
794 {
795 if (!IsInEvadeMode())
796 {
797 // regenerate health if not in combat or if polymorphed)
798 if (!IsInCombat() || IsPolymorphed())
799 RegenerateHealth();
800 else if (IsNotReachableAndNeedRegen())
801 {
802 // regenerate health if cannot reach the target and the setting is set to do so.
803 // this allows to disable the health regen of raid bosses if pathfinding has issues for whatever reason
804 if (sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_REGEN_HP_CANNOT_REACH_TARGET_IN_RAID) || !GetMap()->IsRaid())
805 {
806 RegenerateHealth();
807 LOG_DEBUG("entities.unit", "RegenerateHealth() enabled because Creature cannot reach the target. Detail: {}", GetDebugInfo());
808 }
809 else
810 LOG_DEBUG("entities.unit", "RegenerateHealth() disabled even if the Creature cannot reach the target. Detail: {}", GetDebugInfo());
811 }
812 }
813
814 if (getPowerType() == POWER_ENERGY)
815 Regenerate(POWER_ENERGY);
816 else
817 Regenerate(POWER_MANA);
818
819 m_regenTimer += CREATURE_REGEN_INTERVAL;
820 }
821
822 if (CanNotReachTarget() && !IsInEvadeMode())
823 {
824 m_cannotReachTimer += diff;
825 if (m_cannotReachTimer >= (sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_NPC_EVADE_IF_NOT_REACHABLE) * IN_MILLISECONDS))
826 {
827 Player* cannotReachPlayer = ObjectAccessor::GetPlayer(*this, m_cannotReachTarget);
828 if (cannotReachPlayer && IsEngagedBy(cannotReachPlayer) && IsAIEnabled && AI()->OnTeleportUnreacheablePlayer(cannotReachPlayer))
829 {
830 SetCannotReachTarget();
831 }
832 else if (!GetMap()->IsRaid())
833 {
834 auto EnterEvade = [&]()
835 {
836 if (CreatureAI* ai = AI())
837 {
838 ai->EnterEvadeMode(CreatureAI::EvadeReason::EVADE_REASON_NO_PATH);
839 }
840 };
841
842 if (GetThreatMgr().GetThreatListSize() <= 1)
843 {
844 EnterEvade();
845 }
846 else
847 {
848 if (HostileReference* ref = GetThreatMgr().GetOnlineContainer().getReferenceByTarget(m_cannotReachTarget))
849 {
850 ref->removeReference();
851 SetCannotReachTarget();
852 }
853 else
854 {
855 EnterEvade();
856 }
857 }
858 }
859 }
860 }
861 break;
862 }
863 default:
864 break;
865 }
866
867 if (IsInWorld() && !IsDuringRemoveFromWorld())
868 {
869 // pussywizard:
870 if (GetOwnerGUID().IsPlayer())
871 {
872 if (m_transportCheckTimer <= diff)
873 {
874 m_transportCheckTimer = 1000;
875 Transport* newTransport = GetMap()->GetTransportForPos(GetPhaseMask(), GetPositionX(), GetPositionY(), GetPositionZ(), this);
876 if (newTransport != GetTransport())
877 {
878 if (GetTransport())
879 GetTransport()->RemovePassenger(this, true);
880 if (newTransport)
881 newTransport->AddPassenger(this, true);
882 this->StopMovingOnCurrentPos();
883 //SendMovementFlagUpdate();
884 }
885 }
886 else
887 m_transportCheckTimer -= diff;
888 }
889
890 sScriptMgr->OnCreatureUpdate(this, diff);
891 }
892}
893
894bool Creature::IsFreeToMove()
895{
896 uint32 moveFlags = m_movementInfo.GetMovementFlags();
897 // Do not reposition ourself when we are not allowed to move
898 if ((IsMovementPreventedByCasting() || isMoving() || !CanFreeMove()) &&
899 (GetMotionMaster()->GetCurrentMovementGeneratorType() != CHASE_MOTION_TYPE ||
900 moveFlags & MOVEMENTFLAG_SPLINE_ENABLED))
901 {
902 return false;
903 }
904
905 return true;
906}
907
908void Creature::Regenerate(Powers power)
909{
910 uint32 curValue = GetPower(power);
911 uint32 maxValue = GetMaxPower(power);
912
913 // Xinef: implement power regeneration flag
914 if (!HasUnitFlag2(UNIT_FLAG2_REGENERATE_POWER) && !GetOwnerGUID().IsPlayer())
915 return;
916
917 if (!m_regenPower)
918 {
919 return;
920 }
921
922 if (curValue >= maxValue)
923 return;
924
925 float addvalue = 0.0f;
926
927 switch (power)
928 {
929 case POWER_FOCUS:
930 {
931 // For hunter pets.
932 addvalue = 24 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_POWER_FOCUS);
933 break;
934 }
935 case POWER_ENERGY:
936 {
937 // For deathknight's ghoul.
938 addvalue = 20;
939 break;
940 }
941 case POWER_MANA:
942 {
943 // Combat and any controlled creature
944 if (IsInCombat() || GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID())
945 {
946 if (GetEntry() == NPC_IMP || GetEntry() == NPC_WATER_ELEMENTAL_TEMP || GetEntry() == NPC_WATER_ELEMENTAL_PERM)
947 {
948 addvalue = uint32((GetStat(STAT_SPIRIT) / (IsUnderLastManaUseEffect() ? 8.0f : 5.0f) + 17.0f));
949 }
950 else if (!IsUnderLastManaUseEffect())
951 {
952 float ManaIncreaseRate = sWorld->getRate(RATE_POWER_MANA);
953 float Spirit = GetStat(STAT_SPIRIT);
954
955 addvalue = uint32((Spirit / 5.0f + 17.0f) * ManaIncreaseRate);
956 }
957 }
958 else
959 addvalue = maxValue / 3;
960 break;
961 }
962 default:
963 return;
964 }
965
966 // Apply modifiers (if any).
967 AuraEffectList const& ModPowerRegenPCTAuras = GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_POWER_REGEN_PERCENT);
968 for (AuraEffectList::const_iterator i = ModPowerRegenPCTAuras.begin(); i != ModPowerRegenPCTAuras.end(); ++i)
969 if (Powers((*i)->GetMiscValue()) == power)
970 AddPct(addvalue, (*i)->GetAmount());
971
972 addvalue += GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscValue(SPELL_AURA_MOD_POWER_REGEN, power) * (power == POWER_FOCUS ? PET_FOCUS_REGEN_INTERVAL.count() : CREATURE_REGEN_INTERVAL) / (5 * IN_MILLISECONDS);
973
974 ModifyPower(power, int32(addvalue));
975}
976
977void Creature::RegenerateHealth()
978{
979 if (!isRegeneratingHealth())
980 return;
981
982 uint32 curValue = GetHealth();
983 uint32 maxValue = GetMaxHealth();
984
985 if (curValue >= maxValue)
986 return;
987
988 uint32 addvalue = 0;
989
990 // Not only pet, but any controlled creature
991 // Xinef: fix polymorph rapid regen
992 if (!GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID() || IsPolymorphed())
993 addvalue = maxValue / 3;
994 else //if (GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID())
995 {
996 float HealthIncreaseRate = sWorld->getRate(RATE_HEALTH);
997 float Spirit = GetStat(STAT_SPIRIT);
998
999 if (GetPower(POWER_MANA) > 0)
1000 addvalue = uint32(Spirit * 0.25 * HealthIncreaseRate);
1001 else
1002 addvalue = uint32(Spirit * 0.80 * HealthIncreaseRate);
1003 }
1004
1005 // Apply modifiers (if any).
1006 AuraEffectList const& ModPowerRegenPCTAuras = GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_HEALTH_REGEN_PERCENT);
1007 for (AuraEffectList::const_iterator i = ModPowerRegenPCTAuras.begin(); i != ModPowerRegenPCTAuras.end(); ++i)
1008 AddPct(addvalue, (*i)->GetAmount());
1009
1010 addvalue += GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_REGEN) * CREATURE_REGEN_INTERVAL / (5 * IN_MILLISECONDS);
1011
1012 ModifyHealth(addvalue);
1013}
1014
1015void Creature::DoFleeToGetAssistance()
1016{
1017 if (!GetVictim())
1018 return;
1019
1020 if (HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_PREVENTS_FLEEING))
1021 return;
1022
1023 float radius = sWorld->getFloatConfig(CONFIG_CREATURE_FAMILY_FLEE_ASSISTANCE_RADIUS);
1024 if (radius > 0)
1025 {
1026 Creature* creature = nullptr;
1027
1028 Acore::NearestAssistCreatureInCreatureRangeCheck u_check(this, GetVictim(), radius);
1029 Acore::CreatureLastSearcher<Acore::NearestAssistCreatureInCreatureRangeCheck> searcher(this, creature, u_check);
1030
1031 Cell::VisitGridObjects(this, searcher, radius);
1032
1033 SetNoSearchAssistance(true);
1034 UpdateSpeed(MOVE_RUN, false);
1035
1036 if (!creature)
1037 //SetFeared(true, GetVictim()->GetGUID(), 0, sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CREATURE_FAMILY_FLEE_DELAY));
1038 //TODO: use 31365
1039 SetControlled(true, UNIT_STATE_FLEEING);
1040 else
1041 GetMotionMaster()->MoveSeekAssistance(creature->GetPositionX(), creature->GetPositionY(), creature->GetPositionZ());
1042 }
1043}
1044
1045bool Creature::AIM_Initialize(CreatureAI* ai)
1046{
1047 // make sure nothing can change the AI during AI update
1048 if (m_AI_locked)
1049 {
1050 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "AIM_Initialize: failed to init, locked.");
1051 return false;
1052 }
1053
1054 UnitAI* oldAI = i_AI;
1055
1056 // Xinef: called in add to world
1057 //Motion_Initialize();
1058
1059 i_AI = ai ? ai : FactorySelector::SelectAI(this);
1060 delete oldAI;
1061 IsAIEnabled = true;
1062 i_AI->InitializeAI();
1063
1064 // Xinef: Initialize vehicle if it is not summoned!
1065 if (GetVehicleKit() && m_spawnId)
1066 GetVehicleKit()->Reset();
1067 return true;
1068}
1069
1070void Creature::Motion_Initialize()
1071{
1072 if (!m_formation)
1073 GetMotionMaster()->Initialize();
1074 else if (m_formation->GetLeader() == this)
1075 {
1076 m_formation->FormationReset(false, true);
1077 GetMotionMaster()->Initialize();
1078 }
1079 else if (m_formation->IsFormed())
1080 GetMotionMaster()->MoveIdle(); //wait the order of leader
1081 else
1082 GetMotionMaster()->Initialize();
1083}
1084
1085bool Creature::Create(ObjectGuid::LowType guidlow, Map* map, uint32 phaseMask, uint32 Entry, uint32 vehId, float x, float y, float z, float ang, const CreatureData* data)
1086{
1087 ASSERT(map);
1088 SetMap(map);
1089 SetPhaseMask(phaseMask, false);
1090
1091 CreatureTemplate const* cinfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(Entry);
1092 if (!cinfo)
1093 {
1094 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature::Create(): creature template (guidlow: {}, entry: {}) does not exist.", guidlow, Entry);
1095 return false;
1096 }
1097
1100 Relocate(x, y, z, ang);
1101
1102 if (!IsPositionValid())
1103 {
1104 LOG_ERROR("entities.unit", "Creature::Create(): given coordinates for creature (guidlow {}, entry {}) are not valid (X: {}, Y: {}, Z: {}, O: {})", guidlow, Entry, x, y, z, ang);
1105 return false;
1106 }
1107
1108 // area/zone id is needed immediately for ZoneScript::GetCreatureEntry hook before it is known which creature template to load (no model/scale available yet)
1109 PositionFullTerrainStatus terrainData;
1110 GetMap()->GetFullTerrainStatusForPosition(GetPhaseMask(), GetPositionX(), GetPositionY(), GetPositionZ(), DEFAULT_COLLISION_HEIGHT, terrainData);
1111 ProcessPositionDataChanged(terrainData);
1112
1113 //oX = x; oY = y; dX = x; dY = y; m_moveTime = 0; m_startMove = 0;
1114 if (!CreateFromProto(guidlow, Entry, vehId, data))
1115 return false;
1116
1117 UpdateMovementFlags();
1118
1119 switch (GetCreatureTemplate()->rank)
1120 {
1121 case CREATURE_ELITE_RARE:
1122 m_corpseDelay = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CORPSE_DECAY_RARE);
1123 break;
1124 case CREATURE_ELITE_ELITE:
1125 m_corpseDelay = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CORPSE_DECAY_ELITE);
1126 break;
1127 case CREATURE_ELITE_RAREELITE:
1128 m_corpseDelay = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CORPSE_DECAY_RAREELITE);
1129 break;
1130 case CREATURE_ELITE_WORLDBOSS:
1131 // Xinef: Reduce corpse delay for bossess outside of instance
1132 if (!GetInstanceId())
1133 m_corpseDelay = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CORPSE_DECAY_ELITE) * 2;
1134 else
1135 m_corpseDelay = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CORPSE_DECAY_WORLDBOSS);
1136 break;
1137 default:
1138 m_corpseDelay = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CORPSE_DECAY_NORMAL);
1139 break;
1140 }
1141
1142 uint32 displayID = GetNativeDisplayId();
1143 if (sObjectMgr->GetCreatureModelRandomGender(&displayID) && !IsTotem()) // Cancel load if no model defined or if totem
1144 {
1145 SetDisplayId(displayID);
1146 SetNativeDisplayId(displayID);
1147 }
1148
1149 LoadCreaturesAddon();
1150
1152 m_positionZ += GetHoverHeight();
1153
1154 LastUsedScriptID = GetScriptId();
1155
1156 if (IsSpiritHealer() || IsSpiritGuide() || (GetCreatureTemplate()->flags_extra & CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_GHOST_VISIBILITY))
1157 {
1158 m_serverSideVisibility.SetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST, GHOST_VISIBILITY_GHOST);
1159 m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.SetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST, GHOST_VISIBILITY_GHOST);
1160 }
1161 else if (cinfo->type_flags & CREATURE_TYPE_FLAG_VISIBLE_TO_GHOSTS) // Xinef: Add ghost visibility for ghost units
1162 m_serverSideVisibility.SetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST, GHOST_VISIBILITY_ALIVE | GHOST_VISIBILITY_GHOST);
1163
1164 if (Entry == VISUAL_WAYPOINT)
1165 SetVisible(false);
1166
1167 if (GetCreatureTemplate()->flags_extra & CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_IGNORE_PATHFINDING)
1168 AddUnitState(UNIT_STATE_IGNORE_PATHFINDING);
1169
1170 return true;
1171}
1172
1173bool Creature::isCanInteractWithBattleMaster(Player* player, bool msg) const
1174{
1175 if (!IsBattleMaster())
1176 return false;
1177
1178 BattlegroundTypeId bgTypeId = sBattlegroundMgr->GetBattleMasterBG(GetEntry());
1179 if (!msg)
1180 return player->GetBGAccessByLevel(bgTypeId);
1181
1182 if (!player->GetBGAccessByLevel(bgTypeId))
1183 {
1184 ClearGossipMenuFor(player);
1185 switch (bgTypeId)
1186 {
1187 case BATTLEGROUND_AV:
1188 SendGossipMenuFor(player, 7616, this);
1189 break;
1190 case BATTLEGROUND_WS:
1191 SendGossipMenuFor(player, 7599, this);
1192 break;
1193 case BATTLEGROUND_AB:
1194 SendGossipMenuFor(player, 7642, this);
1195 break;
1196 case BATTLEGROUND_EY:
1197 case BATTLEGROUND_NA:
1198 case BATTLEGROUND_BE:
1199 case BATTLEGROUND_AA:
1200 case BATTLEGROUND_RL:
1201 case BATTLEGROUND_SA:
1202 case BATTLEGROUND_DS:
1203 case BATTLEGROUND_RV:
1204 SendGossipMenuFor(player, 10024, this);
1205 break;
1206 default:
1207 break;
1208 }
1209 return false;
1210 }
1211 return true;
1212}
1213
1214bool Creature::isCanTrainingAndResetTalentsOf(Player* player) const
1215{
1216 return player->getLevel() >= 10
1217 && GetCreatureTemplate()->trainer_type == TRAINER_TYPE_CLASS
1218 && player->getClass() == GetCreatureTemplate()->trainer_class;
1219}
1220
1221bool Creature::IsValidTrainerForPlayer(Player* player, uint32* npcFlags /*= nullptr*/) const
1222{
1223 if (!IsTrainer())
1224 {
1225 return false;
1226 }
1227
1228 switch (m_creatureInfo->trainer_type)
1229 {
1230 case TRAINER_TYPE_CLASS:
1231 case TRAINER_TYPE_PETS:
1232 if (m_creatureInfo->trainer_class && m_creatureInfo->trainer_class != player->getClass())
1233 {
1234 if (npcFlags)
1235 *npcFlags &= ~UNIT_NPC_FLAG_TRAINER_CLASS;
1236
1237 return false;
1238 }
1239 break;
1240 case TRAINER_TYPE_MOUNTS:
1241 if (m_creatureInfo->trainer_race && m_creatureInfo->trainer_race != player->getRace())
1242 {
1243 return false;
1244 }
1245 break;
1246 case TRAINER_TYPE_TRADESKILLS:
1247 if (m_creatureInfo->trainer_spell && !player->HasSpell(m_creatureInfo->trainer_spell))
1248 {
1249 if (npcFlags)
1250 *npcFlags &= ~UNIT_NPC_FLAG_TRAINER_PROFESSION;
1251
1252 return false;
1253 }
1254 break;
1255 default:
1256 break;
1257 }
1258
1259 return true;
1260}

1264 if (!m_lootRecipient)
1265 return nullptr;
1266 return ObjectAccessor::FindConnectedPlayer(m_lootRecipient);
1267}

1269Group* Creature::GetLootRecipientGroup() const

1271 if (!m_lootRecipientGroup)
1272 return nullptr;
1273 return sGroupMgr->GetGroupByGUID(m_lootRecipientGroup);
1274}
1275
1276void Creature::SetLootRecipient(Unit* unit, bool withGroup)
1277{
1278 // set the player whose group should receive the right
1279 // to loot the creature after it dies
1280 // should be set to nullptr after the loot disappears
1281
1282 if (!unit)
1283 {
1284 m_lootRecipient.Clear();
1285 m_lootRecipientGroup = 0;
1286 RemoveDynamicFlag(UNIT_DYNFLAG_LOOTABLE | UNIT_DYNFLAG_TAPPED);
1287 ResetAllowedLooters();
1288 return;
1289 }
1290
1291 Player* player = unit->GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself();
1292 if (!player) // normal creature, no player involved
1293 return;
1294
1295 m_lootRecipient = player->GetGUID();
1296
1297 Map* map = GetMap();
1298 if (map && map->IsDungeon() && (isWorldBoss() || IsDungeonBoss()))
1299 {
1300 AddAllowedLooter(m_lootRecipient);
1301 }
1302
1303 if (withGroup)
1304 {
1305 if (Group* group = player->GetGroup())
1306 {
1307 m_lootRecipientGroup = group->GetGUID().GetCounter();
1308
1309 if (map && map->IsDungeon() && (isWorldBoss() || IsDungeonBoss()))
1310 {
1311 Map::PlayerList const& PlayerList = map->GetPlayers();
1312 for (Map::PlayerList::const_iterator i = PlayerList.begin(); i != PlayerList.end(); ++i)
1313 {
1314 if (Player* groupMember = i->GetSource())
1315 {
1316 if (groupMember->IsGameMaster() || groupMember->IsSpectator())
1317 {
1318 continue;
1319 }
1320
1321 if (groupMember->GetGroup() == group)
1322 {
1323 AddAllowedLooter(groupMember->GetGUID());
1324 }
1325 }
1326 }
1327 }
1328 }
1329 }
1330 else
1331 m_lootRecipientGroup = 0;
1332
1333 SetDynamicFlag(UNIT_DYNFLAG_TAPPED);
1334}
1335
1336// return true if this creature is tapped by the player or by a member of his group.
1337bool Creature::isTappedBy(Player const* player) const
1338{
1339 if (player->GetGUID() == m_lootRecipient)
1340 return true;
1341
1342 Group const* playerGroup = player->GetGroup();
1343 if (!playerGroup || playerGroup != GetLootRecipientGroup()) // if we dont have a group we arent the recipient
1344 return false; // if creature doesnt have group bound it means it was solo killed by someone else
1345
1346 return true;
1347}
1348
1349void Creature::SaveToDB()
1350{
1351 // this should only be used when the creature has already been loaded
1352 // preferably after adding to map, because mapid may not be valid otherwise
1353 CreatureData const* data = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureData(m_spawnId);
1354 if (!data)
1355 {
1356 LOG_ERROR("entities.unit", "Creature::SaveToDB failed, cannot get creature data!");
1357 return;
1358 }
1359
1360 uint32 mapId = GetTransport() && GetTransport()->ToMotionTransport() ? GetTransport()->GetGOInfo()->moTransport.mapID : GetMapId();
1361 SaveToDB(mapId, data->spawnMask, GetPhaseMask());
1362}
1363
1364void Creature::SaveToDB(uint32 mapid, uint8 spawnMask, uint32 phaseMask)
1365{
1366 // update in loaded data
1367 if (!m_spawnId)
1368 m_spawnId = sObjectMgr->GenerateCreatureSpawnId();
1369
1370 CreatureData& data = sObjectMgr->NewOrExistCreatureData(m_spawnId);
1371
1372 uint32 displayId = GetNativeDisplayId();
1373 uint32 npcflag = GetNpcFlags();
1374 uint32 unit_flags = GetUnitFlags();
1375 uint32 dynamicflags = GetDynamicFlags();
1376
1377 // check if it's a custom model and if not, use 0 for displayId
1378 CreatureTemplate const* cinfo = GetCreatureTemplate();
1379 if (cinfo)
1380 {
1381 if (displayId == cinfo->Modelid1 || displayId == cinfo->Modelid2 ||
1382 displayId == cinfo->Modelid3 || displayId == cinfo->Modelid4)
1383 displayId = 0;
1384
1385 if (npcflag == cinfo->npcflag)
1386 npcflag = 0;
1387
1388 if (unit_flags == cinfo->unit_flags)
1389 unit_flags = 0;
1390
1391 if (dynamicflags == cinfo->dynamicflags)
1392 dynamicflags = 0;
1393 }
1394
1395 data.id1 = GetEntry();
1396 data.mapid = mapid;
1397 data.phaseMask = phaseMask;
1398 data.displayid = displayId;
1399 data.equipmentId = GetCurrentEquipmentId();
1400 if (!GetTransport())
1401 {
1402 data.posX = GetPositionX();
1403 data.posY = GetPositionY();
1404 data.posZ = GetPositionZ();
1405 data.orientation = GetOrientation();
1406 }
1407 else
1408 {
1409 data.posX = GetTransOffsetX();
1410 data.posY = GetTransOffsetY();
1411 data.posZ = GetTransOffsetZ();
1412 data.orientation = GetTransOffsetO();
1413 }
1414
1415 data.spawntimesecs = m_respawnDelay;
1416 // prevent add data integrity problems
1417 data.wander_distance = GetDefaultMovementType() == IDLE_MOTION_TYPE ? 0.0f : m_wanderDistance;
1418 data.currentwaypoint = 0;
1419 data.curhealth = GetHealth();
1420 data.curmana = GetPower(POWER_MANA);
1421 // prevent add data integrity problems
1422 data.movementType = !m_wanderDistance && GetDefaultMovementType() == RANDOM_MOTION_TYPE
1423 ? IDLE_MOTION_TYPE : GetDefaultMovementType();
1424 data.spawnMask = spawnMask;
1425 data.npcflag = npcflag;
1426 data.unit_flags = unit_flags;
1427 data.dynamicflags = dynamicflags;
1428
1429 // update in DB
1430 WorldDatabaseTransaction trans = WorldDatabase.BeginTransaction();
1431
1432 WorldDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = WorldDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(WORLD_DEL_CREATURE);
1433 stmt->SetData(0, m_spawnId);
1434 trans->Append(stmt);
1435
1436 uint8 index = 0;
1437
1438 stmt = WorldDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(WORLD_INS_CREATURE);
1439 stmt->SetData(index++, m_spawnId);
1440 stmt->SetData(index++, GetEntry());
1441 stmt->SetData(index++, 0);
1442 stmt->SetData(index++, 0);
1443 stmt->SetData(index++, uint16(mapid));
1444 stmt->SetData(index++, spawnMask);
1445 stmt->SetData(index++, GetPhaseMask());
1446 stmt->SetData(index++, int32(GetCurrentEquipmentId()));
1447 stmt->SetData(index++, GetPositionX());
1448 stmt->SetData(index++, GetPositionY());
1449 stmt->SetData(index++, GetPositionZ());
1450 stmt->SetData(index++, GetOrientation());
1451 stmt->SetData(index++, m_respawnDelay);
1452 stmt->SetData(index++, m_wanderDistance);
1453 stmt->SetData(index++, 0);
1454 stmt->SetData(index++, GetHealth());
1455 stmt->SetData(index++, GetPower(POWER_MANA));
1456 stmt->SetData(index++, uint8(GetDefaultMovementType()));
1457 stmt->SetData(index++, npcflag);
1458 stmt->SetData(index++, unit_flags);
1459 stmt->SetData(index++, dynamicflags);
1460 trans->Append(stmt);
1461
1462 WorldDatabase.CommitTransaction(trans);
1463 sScriptMgr->OnCreatureSaveToDB(this);
1464}
1465
1466void Creature::SelectLevel(bool changelevel)
1467{
1468 CreatureTemplate const* cInfo = GetCreatureTemplate();
1469
1470 uint32 rank = IsPet() ? 0 : cInfo->rank;
1471
1472 // level
1473 uint8 minlevel = std::min(cInfo->maxlevel, cInfo->minlevel);
1474 uint8 maxlevel = std::max(cInfo->maxlevel, cInfo->minlevel);
1475 uint8 level = minlevel == maxlevel ? minlevel : urand(minlevel, maxlevel);
1476 if (changelevel)
1477 SetLevel(level);
1478
1479 CreatureBaseStats const* stats = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureBaseStats(level, cInfo->unit_class);
1480
1481 // health
1482 float healthmod = _GetHealthMod(rank);
1483
1484 uint32 basehp = std::max<uint32>(1, stats->GenerateHealth(cInfo));
1485 uint32 health = uint32(basehp * healthmod);
1486
1487 SetCreateHealth(health);
1488 SetMaxHealth(health);
1489 SetHealth(health);
1490 ResetPlayerDamageReq();
1491
1492 // mana
1493 uint32 mana = stats->GenerateMana(cInfo);
1494
1495 SetCreateMana(mana);
1496 SetMaxPower(POWER_MANA, mana); //MAX Mana
1497 SetPower(POWER_MANA, mana);
1498
1499 // TODO: set UNIT_FIELD_POWER*, for some creature class case (energy, etc)
1500
1501 SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_HEALTH, BASE_VALUE, (float)health);
1502 SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_MANA, BASE_VALUE, (float)mana);
1503
1504 // damage
1505
1506 float basedamage = stats->GenerateBaseDamage(cInfo);
1507
1508 float weaponBaseMinDamage = basedamage;
1509 float weaponBaseMaxDamage = basedamage * 1.5;
1510
1511 SetBaseWeaponDamage(BASE_ATTACK, MINDAMAGE, weaponBaseMinDamage);
1512 SetBaseWeaponDamage(BASE_ATTACK, MAXDAMAGE, weaponBaseMaxDamage);
1513
1514 SetBaseWeaponDamage(OFF_ATTACK, MINDAMAGE, weaponBaseMinDamage);
1515 SetBaseWeaponDamage(OFF_ATTACK, MAXDAMAGE, weaponBaseMaxDamage);
1516
1517 SetBaseWeaponDamage(RANGED_ATTACK, MINDAMAGE, weaponBaseMinDamage);
1518 SetBaseWeaponDamage(RANGED_ATTACK, MAXDAMAGE, weaponBaseMaxDamage);
1519
1520 SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_ATTACK_POWER, BASE_VALUE, stats->AttackPower);
1521 SetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_ATTACK_POWER_RANGED, BASE_VALUE, stats->RangedAttackPower);
1522
1523 sScriptMgr->Creature_SelectLevel(cInfo, this);
1524}

1527{
1528 switch (Rank) // define rates for each elite rank
1529 {
1530 case CREATURE_ELITE_NORMAL:
1531 return sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_NORMAL_HP);
1532 case CREATURE_ELITE_ELITE:
1533 return sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_ELITE_ELITE_HP);
1534 case CREATURE_ELITE_RAREELITE:
1535 return sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_ELITE_RAREELITE_HP);
1536 case CREATURE_ELITE_WORLDBOSS:
1537 return sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_ELITE_WORLDBOSS_HP);
1538 case CREATURE_ELITE_RARE:
1539 return sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_ELITE_RARE_HP);
1540 default:
1541 return sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_ELITE_ELITE_HP);
1542 }
1543}

1582
1583bool Creature::CreateFromProto(ObjectGuid::LowType guidlow, uint32 Entry, uint32 vehId, const CreatureData* data)
1584{
1585 SetZoneScript();
1586 if (GetZoneScript() && data)
1587 {
1588 uint32 FirstEntry = GetZoneScript()->GetCreatureEntry(guidlow, data);
1589 if (!FirstEntry)
1590 return false;
1591 }
1592
1593 CreatureTemplate const* normalInfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(Entry);
1594 if (!normalInfo)
1595 {
1596 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature::CreateFromProto(): creature template (guidlow: {}, entry: {}) does not exist.", guidlow, Entry);
1597 return false;
1598 }
1599
1600 SetOriginalEntry(Entry);
1601
1602 Object::_Create(guidlow, Entry, (vehId || normalInfo->VehicleId) ? HighGuid::Vehicle : HighGuid::Unit);
1603
1604 // Xinef: select proper vehicle id
1605 if (!vehId)
1606 {
1607 CreatureTemplate const* cinfo = normalInfo;
1608 for (uint8 diff = uint8(GetMap()->GetSpawnMode()); diff > 0 && !IsPet();)
1609 {
1610 // we already have valid Map pointer for current creature!
1611 if (cinfo->DifficultyEntry[diff - 1])
1612 {
1613 cinfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(normalInfo->DifficultyEntry[diff - 1]);
1614 if (cinfo && cinfo->VehicleId)
1615 break; // template found
1616
1617 // check and reported at startup, so just ignore (restore normalInfo)
1618 cinfo = normalInfo;
1619 }
1620
1621 // for instances heroic to normal, other cases attempt to retrieve previous difficulty
1622 if (diff >= RAID_DIFFICULTY_10MAN_HEROIC && GetMap()->IsRaid())
1623 diff -= 2; // to normal raid difficulty cases
1624 else
1625 --diff;
1626 }
1627
1628 if (cinfo->VehicleId)
1629 CreateVehicleKit(cinfo->VehicleId, (cinfo->VehicleId != normalInfo->VehicleId ? cinfo->Entry : normalInfo->Entry));
1630 }
1631 else
1632 CreateVehicleKit(vehId, Entry);
1633
1634 if (!UpdateEntry(Entry, data))
1635 return false;
1636
1637 return true;
1638}

1640bool Creature::isVendorWithIconSpeak() const

1642 return m_creatureInfo->IconName == "Speak" && m_creatureData->npcflag & UNIT_NPC_FLAG_VENDOR;
1643}
1644
1645bool Creature::LoadCreatureFromDB(ObjectGuid::LowType spawnId, Map* map, bool addToMap, bool gridLoad, bool allowDuplicate /*= false*/)
1646{
1647 if (!allowDuplicate)
1648 {
1649 // If an alive instance of this spawnId is already found, skip creation
1650 // If only dead instance(s) exist, despawn them and spawn a new (maybe also dead) version
1651 const auto creatureBounds = map->GetCreatureBySpawnIdStore().equal_range(spawnId);
1652 std::vector <Creature*> despawnList;
1653
1654 if (creatureBounds.first != creatureBounds.second)
1655 {
1656 for (auto itr = creatureBounds.first; itr != creatureBounds.second; ++itr)
1657 {
1658 if (itr->second->IsAlive())
1659 {
1660 LOG_DEBUG("maps", "Would have spawned {} but {} already exists", spawnId, creatureBounds.first->second->GetGUID().ToString());
1661 return false;
1662 }
1663 else
1664 {
1665 despawnList.push_back(itr->second);
1666 LOG_DEBUG("maps", "Despawned dead instance of spawn {} ({})", spawnId, itr->second->GetGUID().ToString());
1667 }
1668 }
1669
1670 for (Creature* despawnCreature : despawnList)
1671 {
1672 despawnCreature->AddObjectToRemoveList();
1673 }
1674 }
1675 }
1676
1677 CreatureData const* data = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureData(spawnId);
1678 if (!data)
1679 {
1680 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature (SpawnId: {}) not found in table `creature`, can't load. ", spawnId);
1681 return false;
1682 }
1683
1684 // xinef: fix from db
1685 if ((addToMap || gridLoad) && !data->overwrittenZ)
1686 {
1687 float tz = map->GetHeight(data->posX, data->posY, data->posZ + 1.0f, true);
1688 if (tz >= data->posZ && tz - data->posZ <= 1.0f)
1689 const_cast<CreatureData*>(data)->posZ = tz + 0.1f;
1690
1691 const_cast<CreatureData*>(data)->overwrittenZ = true;
1692 }
1693
1694 // xinef: this has to be assigned before Create function, properly loads equipment id from DB
1695 m_creatureData = data;
1696 m_spawnId = spawnId;
1697
1698 // Add to world
1699 uint32 entry = GetRandomId(data->id1, data->id2, data->id3);
1700
1701 if (!Create(map->GenerateLowGuid<HighGuid::Unit>(), map, data->phaseMask, entry, 0, data->posX, data->posY, data->posZ, data->orientation, data))
1702 return false;
1703
1704 //We should set first home position, because then AI calls home movement
1705 SetHomePosition(data->posX, data->posY, data->posZ, data->orientation);
1706
1707 m_wanderDistance = data->wander_distance;
1708
1709 m_respawnDelay = data->spawntimesecs;
1710 m_deathState = ALIVE;
1711
1712 m_respawnTime = GetMap()->GetCreatureRespawnTime(m_spawnId);
1713 if (m_respawnTime) // respawn on Update
1714 {
1715 m_deathState = DEAD;
1716 if (CanFly())
1717 {
1718 float tz = map->GetHeight(GetPhaseMask(), data->posX, data->posY, data->posZ, true, MAX_FALL_DISTANCE);
1719 if (data->posZ - tz > 0.1f && Acore::IsValidMapCoord(tz))
1720 {
1721 Relocate(data->posX, data->posY, tz);
1722 }
1723 }
1724 }
1725
1726 uint32 curhealth;
1727
1728 if (!m_regenHealth)
1729 {
1730 curhealth = data->curhealth;
1731 if (curhealth)
1732 {
1733 curhealth = uint32(curhealth * _GetHealthMod(GetCreatureTemplate()->rank));
1734 if (curhealth < 1)
1735 curhealth = 1;
1736 }
1737 SetPower(POWER_MANA, data->curmana);
1738 }
1739 else
1740 {
1741 curhealth = GetMaxHealth();
1742 SetPower(POWER_MANA, GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA));
1743 }
1744
1745 SetHealth(m_deathState == ALIVE ? curhealth : 0);
1746
1747 // checked at creature_template loading
1748 m_defaultMovementType = MovementGeneratorType(data->movementType);
1749
1750 if (addToMap && !GetMap()->AddToMap(this))
1751 return false;
1752 return true;
1753}
1754
1755void Creature::SetCanDualWield(bool value)
1756{
1757 Unit::SetCanDualWield(value);
1758 UpdateDamagePhysical(OFF_ATTACK);
1759}

1761void Creature::LoadEquipment(int8 id, bool force /*= false*/)
1762{
1763 if (id == 0)
1764 {
1765 if (force)
1766 {
1767 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_EQUIPMENT_ITEMS; ++i)
1768 SetUInt32Value(UNIT_VIRTUAL_ITEM_SLOT_ID + i, 0);
1769 m_equipmentId = 0;
1770 }
1771 return;
1772 }
1773
1774 EquipmentInfo const* einfo = sObjectMgr->GetEquipmentInfo(GetEntry(), id);
1775 if (!einfo)
1776 return;
1777
1778 m_equipmentId = id;
1779 for (uint8 i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
1780 SetUInt32Value(UNIT_VIRTUAL_ITEM_SLOT_ID + i, einfo->ItemEntry[i]);
1781}

1786 for (QuestRelations::const_iterator itr = qr.first; itr != qr.second; ++itr)

1791 return false;

1804
1805void Creature::DeleteFromDB()
1806{
1807 if (!m_spawnId)
1808 {
1809 LOG_ERROR("entities.unit", "Trying to delete not saved creature: {}", GetGUID().ToString());
1810 return;
1811 }
1812
1813 GetMap()->RemoveCreatureRespawnTime(m_spawnId);
1814 sObjectMgr->DeleteCreatureData(m_spawnId);
1815
1816 WorldDatabaseTransaction trans = WorldDatabase.BeginTransaction();
1817
1818 WorldDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = WorldDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(WORLD_DEL_CREATURE);
1819 stmt->SetData(0, m_spawnId);
1820 trans->Append(stmt);
1821
1822 stmt = WorldDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(WORLD_DEL_CREATURE_ADDON);
1823 stmt->SetData(0, m_spawnId);
1824 trans->Append(stmt);
1825
1826 stmt = WorldDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(WORLD_DEL_GAME_EVENT_CREATURE);
1827 stmt->SetData(0, m_spawnId);
1828 trans->Append(stmt);
1829
1830 stmt = WorldDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(WORLD_DEL_GAME_EVENT_MODEL_EQUIP);
1831 stmt->SetData(0, m_spawnId);
1832 trans->Append(stmt);
1833
1834 WorldDatabase.CommitTransaction(trans);
1835}

1870
1871bool Creature::CanStartAttack(Unit const* who) const
1872{
1873 if (IsCivilian())
1874 return false;
1875
1876 // This set of checks is should be done only for creatures
1877 if ((IsImmuneToNPC() && who->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER) || // flag is valid only for non player characters
1878 (IsImmuneToPC() && who->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)) // immune to PC and target is a player, return false
1879 {
1880 return false;
1881 }
1882
1883 if (Unit* owner = who->GetOwner())
1884 if (owner->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && IsImmuneToPC()) // immune to PC and target has player owner
1885 return false;
1886
1887 // Do not attack non-combat pets
1888 if (who->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && who->GetCreatureType() == CREATURE_TYPE_NON_COMBAT_PET)
1889 return false;
1890
1891 if (!CanFly() && (GetDistanceZ(who) > CREATURE_Z_ATTACK_RANGE + m_CombatDistance)) // too much Z difference, skip very costy vmap calculations here
1892 return false;
1893
1894 if (!_IsTargetAcceptable(who))
1895 return false;
1896
1897 // pussywizard: at this point we are either hostile to who or friendly to who->getAttackerForHelper()
1898 // pussywizard: if who is in combat and has an attacker, help him if the distance is right (help because who is hostile or help because attacker is friendly)
1899 bool assist = false;
1900 if (who->IsEngaged() && IsWithinDist(who, ATTACK_DISTANCE))
1901 if (Unit* victim = who->getAttackerForHelper())
1902 if (IsWithinDistInMap(victim, sWorld->getFloatConfig(CONFIG_CREATURE_FAMILY_ASSISTANCE_RADIUS)))
1903 assist = true;
1904
1905 if (!assist)
1906 if (IsNeutralToAll() || !IsWithinDistInMap(who, GetAggroRange(who) + m_CombatDistance, true, false)) // pussywizard: +m_combatDistance for turrets and similar
1907 return false;
1908
1909 if (!CanCreatureAttack(who))
1910 return false;
1911
1912 if (HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_STUNNED))
1913 return false;
1914
1915 return IsWithinLOSInMap(who);
1916}
1917
1918void Creature::setDeathState(DeathState s, bool despawn)
1919{
1920 Unit::setDeathState(s, despawn);
1921
1922 if (s == JUST_DIED)
1923 {
1924 _lastDamagedTime.reset();
1925
1926 m_corpseRemoveTime = GameTime::GetGameTime().count() + m_corpseDelay;
1927 m_respawnTime = GameTime::GetGameTime().count() + m_respawnDelay + m_corpseDelay;
1928
1929 // always save boss respawn time at death to prevent crash cheating
1930 if (GetMap()->IsDungeon() || isWorldBoss() || GetCreatureTemplate()->rank >= CREATURE_ELITE_ELITE)
1931 SaveRespawnTime();
1932
1933 SetTarget(); // remove target selection in any cases (can be set at aura remove in Unit::setDeathState)
1934 ReplaceAllNpcFlags(UNIT_NPC_FLAG_NONE);
1935
1936 Dismount(); // if creature is mounted on a virtual mount, remove it at death
1937
1938 setActive(false);
1939
1940 if (HasSearchedAssistance())
1941 {
1942 SetNoSearchAssistance(false);
1943 }
1944
1945 //Dismiss group if is leader
1946 if (m_formation && m_formation->GetLeader() == this)
1947 m_formation->FormationReset(true, false);
1948
1949 bool needsFalling = !despawn && (IsFlying() || IsHovering()) && !IsUnderWater();
1950 SetHover(false, false, false);
1951 SetDisableGravity(false, false, false);
1952
1953 if (needsFalling)
1954 GetMotionMaster()->MoveFall(0, true);
1955
1956 Unit::setDeathState(CORPSE, despawn);
1957 }
1958 else if (s == JUST_RESPAWNED)
1959 {
1960 //if (IsPet())
1961 // setActive(true);
1962 SetFullHealth();
1963 SetLootRecipient(nullptr);
1964 ResetPlayerDamageReq();
1965 SetCannotReachTarget();
1966 CreatureTemplate const* cinfo = GetCreatureTemplate();
1967 // Xinef: npc run by default
1968 //SetWalk(true);
1969
1970 // pussywizard:
1971 if (HasUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_FALLING))
1972 RemoveUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_FALLING);
1973
1974 UpdateMovementFlags();
1975
1976 ReplaceAllNpcFlags(NPCFlags(cinfo->npcflag));
1977 ClearUnitState(uint32(UNIT_STATE_ALL_STATE & ~(UNIT_STATE_IGNORE_PATHFINDING | UNIT_STATE_NO_ENVIRONMENT_UPD)));
1978 SetMeleeDamageSchool(SpellSchools(cinfo->dmgschool));
1979
1980 Unit::setDeathState(ALIVE, despawn);
1981
1982 Motion_Initialize();
1983 LoadCreaturesAddon(true);
1984 if (GetCreatureData() && GetPhaseMask() != GetCreatureData()->phaseMask)
1985 SetPhaseMask(GetCreatureData()->phaseMask, false);
1986 }
1987}
1988
1989void Creature::Respawn(bool force)
1990{
1991 //DestroyForNearbyPlayers(); // pussywizard: not needed
1992
1993 if (force)
1994 {
1995 if (IsAlive())
1996 setDeathState(JUST_DIED);
1997 else if (getDeathState() != CORPSE)
1998 setDeathState(CORPSE);
1999 }
2000
2001 RemoveCorpse(false, false);
2002
2003 if (getDeathState() == DEAD)
2004 {
2005 if (m_spawnId)
2006 {
2007 GetMap()->RemoveCreatureRespawnTime(m_spawnId);
2008 CreatureData const* data = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureData(m_spawnId);
2009 // Respawn check if spawn has 2 entries
2010 if (data->id2)
2011 {
2012 uint32 entry = GetRandomId(data->id1, data->id2, data->id3);
2013 UpdateEntry(entry, data, true); // Select Random Entry
2014 m_defaultMovementType = MovementGeneratorType(data->movementType); // Reload Movement Type
2015 LoadEquipment(data->equipmentId); // Reload Equipment
2016 AIM_Initialize(); // Reload AI
2017 }
2018 else
2019 {
2020 if (m_originalEntry != GetEntry())
2021 UpdateEntry(m_originalEntry);
2022 }
2023 }
2024
2025 LOG_DEBUG("entities.unit", "Respawning creature {} (SpawnId: {}, {})", GetName(), GetSpawnId(), GetGUID().ToString());
2026 m_respawnTime = 0;
2027 ResetPickPocketLootTime();
2028 loot.clear();
2029 SelectLevel();
2030
2031 setDeathState(JUST_RESPAWNED);
2032
2033 // MDic - Acidmanifesto
2034 // Do not override transform auras
2035 if (GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_TRANSFORM).empty())
2036 {
2037 uint32 displayID = GetNativeDisplayId();
2038 if (sObjectMgr->GetCreatureModelRandomGender(&displayID)) // Cancel load if no model defined
2039 {
2040 SetDisplayId(displayID);
2041 SetNativeDisplayId(displayID);
2042 }
2043 }
2044
2045 GetMotionMaster()->InitDefault();
2046
2047 //Call AI respawn virtual function
2048 if (IsAIEnabled)
2049 {
2050 //reset the AI to be sure no dirty or uninitialized values will be used till next tick
2051 AI()->Reset();
2052 TriggerJustRespawned = true;//delay event to next tick so all creatures are created on the map before processing
2053 }
2054
2055 uint32 poolid = m_spawnId ? sPoolMgr->IsPartOfAPool<Creature>(m_spawnId) : 0;
2056 if (poolid)
2057 sPoolMgr->UpdatePool<Creature>(poolid, m_spawnId);
2058
2059 //Re-initialize reactstate that could be altered by movementgenerators
2060 InitializeReactState();
2061
2062 m_respawnedTime = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
2063 }
2064 m_respawnedTime = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
2065 // xinef: relocate notifier, fixes npc appearing in corpse position after forced respawn (instead of spawn)
2066 m_last_notify_position.Relocate(-5000.0f, -5000.0f, -5000.0f, 0.0f);
2067 UpdateObjectVisibility(false);
2068}

2070void Creature::ForcedDespawn(uint32 timeMSToDespawn, Seconds forceRespawnTimer)
2071{
2072 if (timeMSToDespawn)
2073 {
2074 ForcedDespawnDelayEvent* pEvent = new ForcedDespawnDelayEvent(*this, forceRespawnTimer);

2076 return;

2079 if (IsAlive())
2080 setDeathState(JUST_DIED, true);
2081

2083 RemoveCorpse(true);
2084
2085 if (forceRespawnTimer > Seconds::zero())
2086 {
2087 m_respawnTime = GameTime::GetGameTime().count() + forceRespawnTimer.count();
2088 m_respawnDelay = forceRespawnTimer.count();

2132
2133void Creature::LoadSpellTemplateImmunity()
2134{
2135 // uint32 max used for "spell id", the immunity system will not perform SpellInfo checks against invalid spells
2136 // used so we know which immunities were loaded from template
2137 static uint32 const placeholderSpellId = std::numeric_limits<uint32>::max();
2138
2139 // unapply template immunities (in case we're updating entry)
2140 for (uint8 i = SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL; i <= SPELL_SCHOOL_ARCANE; ++i)
2141 {
2142 ApplySpellImmune(placeholderSpellId, IMMUNITY_SCHOOL, i, false);
2143 }
2144
2145 // don't inherit immunities for hunter pets
2146 if (GetOwnerGUID().IsPlayer() && IsHunterPet())
2147 {
2148 return;
2149 }
2150
2151 if (uint8 mask = GetCreatureTemplate()->SpellSchoolImmuneMask)
2152 {
2153 for (uint8 i = SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL; i <= SPELL_SCHOOL_ARCANE; ++i)
2154 {
2155 if (mask & (1 << i))
2156 {
2157 ApplySpellImmune(placeholderSpellId, IMMUNITY_SCHOOL, 1 << i, true);
2158 }
2159 }
2160 }
2161}
2162
2163bool Creature::IsImmunedToSpell(SpellInfo const* spellInfo, Spell const* spell)
2164{
2165 if (!spellInfo)
2166 return false;
2167
2168 // Xinef: this should exclude self casts...
2169 // Spells that don't have effectMechanics.
2170 if (spellInfo->Mechanic > MECHANIC_NONE && HasMechanicTemplateImmunity(1 << (spellInfo->Mechanic - 1)))
2171 return true;
2172
2173 // This check must be done instead of 'if (GetCreatureTemplate()->MechanicImmuneMask & (1 << (spellInfo->Mechanic - 1)))' for not break
2174 // the check of mechanic immunity on DB (tested) because GetCreatureTemplate()->MechanicImmuneMask and m_spellImmune[IMMUNITY_MECHANIC] don't have same data.
2175 bool immunedToAllEffects = true;
2176 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
2177 if (spellInfo->Effects[i].IsEffect() && !IsImmunedToSpellEffect(spellInfo, i))
2178 {
2179 immunedToAllEffects = false;
2180 break;
2181 }
2182 if (immunedToAllEffects)
2183 return true;
2184
2185 return Unit::IsImmunedToSpell(spellInfo, spell);
2186}
2187
2188bool Creature::IsImmunedToSpellEffect(SpellInfo const* spellInfo, uint32 index) const
2189{
2190 // Xinef: this should exclude self casts...
2191 if (spellInfo->Effects[index].Mechanic > MECHANIC_NONE && HasMechanicTemplateImmunity(1 << (spellInfo->Effects[index].Mechanic - 1)))
2192 return true;
2193
2194 if (GetCreatureTemplate()->type == CREATURE_TYPE_MECHANICAL && spellInfo->Effects[index].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_HEAL)
2195 return true;
2196
2197 return Unit::IsImmunedToSpellEffect(spellInfo, index);
2198}
2199
2200SpellInfo const* Creature::reachWithSpellAttack(Unit* victim)
2201{
2202 if (!victim)
2203 return nullptr;
2204
2205 for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_CREATURE_SPELLS; ++i)
2206 {
2207 if (!m_spells[i])
2208 continue;
2209 SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(m_spells[i]);
2210 if (!spellInfo)
2211 {
2212 LOG_ERROR("entities.unit", "WORLD: unknown spell id {}", m_spells[i]);
2213 continue;
2214 }
2215
2216 bool bcontinue = true;
2217 for (uint32 j = 0; j < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; j++)
2218 {
2219 if ((spellInfo->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_SCHOOL_DAMAGE) ||
2220 (spellInfo->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_INSTAKILL) ||
2221 (spellInfo->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_ENVIRONMENTAL_DAMAGE) ||
2222 (spellInfo->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_HEALTH_LEECH)
2223 )
2224 {
2225 bcontinue = false;
2226 break;
2227 }
2228 }
2229 if (bcontinue)
2230 continue;
2231
2232 if (spellInfo->ManaCost > GetPower(POWER_MANA))
2233 continue;
2234 float range = spellInfo->GetMaxRange(false);
2235 float minrange = spellInfo->GetMinRange(false);
2236 float dist = GetDistance(victim);
2237 if (dist > range || dist < minrange)
2238 continue;
2239 if (spellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_SILENCE && HasUnitFlag(UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED))
2240 continue;
2241 if (spellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_PACIFY && HasUnitFlag(UNIT_FLAG_PACIFIED))
2242 continue;
2243 return spellInfo;
2244 }
2245 return nullptr;
2246}
2247
2248SpellInfo const* Creature::reachWithSpellCure(Unit* victim)
2249{
2250 if (!victim)
2251 return nullptr;
2252
2253 for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_CREATURE_SPELLS; ++i)
2254 {
2255 if (!m_spells[i])
2256 continue;
2257 SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(m_spells[i]);
2258 if (!spellInfo)
2259 {
2260 LOG_ERROR("entities.unit", "WORLD: unknown spell id {}", m_spells[i]);
2261 continue;
2262 }
2263
2264 bool bcontinue = true;
2265 for (uint32 j = 0; j < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; j++)
2266 {
2267 if ((spellInfo->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_HEAL))
2268 {
2269 bcontinue = false;
2270 break;
2271 }
2272 }
2273 if (bcontinue)
2274 continue;
2275
2276 if (spellInfo->ManaCost > GetPower(POWER_MANA))
2277 continue;
2278
2279 float range = spellInfo->GetMaxRange(true);
2280 float minrange = spellInfo->GetMinRange(true);
2281 float dist = GetDistance(victim);
2282 //if (!isInFront(victim, range) && spellInfo->AttributesEx)
2283 // continue;
2284 if (dist > range || dist < minrange)
2285 continue;
2286 if (spellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_SILENCE && HasUnitFlag(UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED))
2287 continue;
2288 if (spellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_PACIFY && HasUnitFlag(UNIT_FLAG_PACIFIED))
2289 continue;
2290 return spellInfo;
2291 }
2292 return nullptr;
2293}

2295// select nearest hostile unit within the given distance (regardless of threat list).
2296Unit* Creature::SelectNearestTarget(float dist, bool playerOnly /* = false */) const
2297{
2298 if (dist == 0.0f)
2299 {
2300 dist = MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE;
2301 }
2302
2303 Unit* target = nullptr;
2304
2305 Acore::NearestHostileUnitCheck u_check(this, dist, playerOnly);
2306 Acore::UnitLastSearcher<Acore::NearestHostileUnitCheck> searcher(this, target, u_check);
2307 Cell::VisitAllObjects(this, searcher, dist);
2308 return target;
2309}
2310
2311// select nearest hostile unit within the given attack distance (i.e. distance is ignored if > than ATTACK_DISTANCE), regardless of threat list.
2312Unit* Creature::SelectNearestTargetInAttackDistance(float dist) const
2313{
2314 if (dist < ATTACK_DISTANCE)
2315 dist = ATTACK_DISTANCE;
2316 if (dist > MAX_SEARCHER_DISTANCE)
2317 dist = MAX_SEARCHER_DISTANCE;
2318
2319 Unit* target = nullptr;
2320 Acore::NearestHostileUnitInAttackDistanceCheck u_check(this, dist);
2321 Acore::UnitLastSearcher<Acore::NearestHostileUnitInAttackDistanceCheck> searcher(this, target, u_check);
2322 Cell::VisitAllObjects(this, searcher, std::max(dist, ATTACK_DISTANCE));
2323
2324 return target;
2325}

2338
2339void Creature::CallAssistance(Unit* target /*= nullptr*/)
2340{
2341 if (!target)
2342 {
2343 target = GetVictim();
2344 }
2345
2346 if (!m_AlreadyCallAssistance && target && !IsPet() && !IsCharmed())
2347 {
2348 SetNoCallAssistance(true);
2349
2350 float radius = sWorld->getFloatConfig(CONFIG_CREATURE_FAMILY_ASSISTANCE_RADIUS);
2351
2352 if (radius > 0)
2353 {
2354 std::list<Creature*> assistList;
2355
2356 Acore::AnyAssistCreatureInRangeCheck u_check(this, target, radius);
2357 Acore::CreatureListSearcher<Acore::AnyAssistCreatureInRangeCheck> searcher(this, assistList, u_check);
2358 Cell::VisitGridObjects(this, searcher, radius);
2359
2360 if (!assistList.empty())
2361 {
2362 AssistDelayEvent* e = new AssistDelayEvent(target->GetGUID(), this);
2363 while (!assistList.empty())
2364 {
2365 // Pushing guids because in delay can happen some creature gets despawned => invalid pointer
2366 e->AddAssistant((*assistList.begin())->GetGUID());
2367 assistList.pop_front();
2368 }
2369 m_Events.AddEvent(e, m_Events.CalculateTime(sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_CREATURE_FAMILY_ASSISTANCE_DELAY)));
2370 }
2371 }
2372 }
2373}

2375void Creature::CallForHelp(float radius, Unit* target /*= nullptr*/)
2376{
2377 if (radius <= 0.0f || IsPet() || IsCharmed())
2378 {
2379 return;
2380 }
2381
2382 if (!target)
2383 {
2384 target = GetVictim();
2385 }
2386
2387 if (!target)
2388 {
2389 return;
2390 }
2391
2392 Acore::CallOfHelpCreatureInRangeDo u_do(this, target, radius);
2393 Acore::CreatureWorker<Acore::CallOfHelpCreatureInRangeDo> worker(this, u_do);
2394 Cell::VisitGridObjects(this, worker, radius);
2395}
2396
2397bool Creature::CanAssistTo(Unit const* u, Unit const* enemy, bool checkfaction /*= true*/) const
2398{
2399 // is it true?
2400 if (!HasReactState(REACT_AGGRESSIVE))
2401 return false;
2402
2403 // we don't need help from zombies :)
2404 if (!IsAlive())
2405 return false;
2406
2407 // Xinef: we cannot assist in evade mode
2408 if (IsInEvadeMode())
2409 return false;
2410
2411 // pussywizard: or if enemy is in evade mode
2412 if (enemy && enemy->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && enemy->ToCreature()->IsInEvadeMode())
2413 return false;
2414
2415 // we don't need help from non-combatant ;)
2416 if (IsCivilian())
2417 return false;
2418
2419 if (HasUnitFlag(UNIT_FLAG_NON_ATTACKABLE | UNIT_FLAG_NOT_SELECTABLE) || IsImmuneToNPC())
2420 return false;
2421
2422 // skip fighting creature
2423 if (IsEngaged())
2424 return false;
2425
2426 // only free creature
2427 if (GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID())
2428 return false;
2429
2430 // Check for ignore assistance extra flag
2431 if (m_creatureInfo->HasFlagsExtra(CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_IGNORE_ASSISTANCE_CALL))
2432 {
2433 return false;
2434 }
2435
2436 // only from same creature faction
2437 if (checkfaction)
2438 {
2439 if (GetFaction() != u->GetFaction())
2440 return false;
2441 }
2442 else
2443 {
2444 if (!IsFriendlyTo(u))
2445 return false;
2446 }
2447
2448 // skip non hostile to caster enemy creatures
2449 if (!IsHostileTo(enemy))
2450 return false;
2451
2452 // Check if can see the enemy
2453 if (!CanSeeOrDetect(enemy))
2454 {
2455 return false;
2456 }
2457
2458 return true;
2459}
2460
2461// use this function to avoid having hostile creatures attack
2462// friendlies and other mobs they shouldn't attack
2463bool Creature::_IsTargetAcceptable(Unit const* target) const
2464{
2465 ASSERT(target);
2466
2467 // if the target cannot be attacked, the target is not acceptable
2468 if (IsFriendlyTo(target) || !target->isTargetableForAttack(false, this) || (m_vehicle && (IsOnVehicle(target) || m_vehicle->GetBase()->IsOnVehicle(target))))
2469 return false;
2470
2471 if (target->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_DIED))
2472 {
2473 // some creatures can detect fake death
2474 if (CanIgnoreFeignDeath() && target->HasUnitFlag2(UNIT_FLAG2_FEIGN_DEATH))
2475 return true;
2476 else
2477 return false;
2478 }
2479
2480 Unit const* targetVictim = target->getAttackerForHelper();
2481
2482 // if I'm already fighting target, or I'm hostile towards the target, the target is acceptable
2483 if (IsEngagedBy(target) || IsHostileTo(target))
2484 return true;
2485
2486 // if the target's victim is friendly, and the target is neutral, the target is acceptable
2487 if (targetVictim && !IsNeutralToAll() && IsFriendlyTo(targetVictim))
2488 return true;
2489
2490 // if the target's victim is not friendly, or the target is friendly, the target is not acceptable
2491 return false;
2492}
2493
2494void Creature::UpdateMoveInLineOfSightState()
2495{
2496 // xinef: pets, guardians and units with scripts / smartAI should be skipped
2497 if (IsPet() || HasUnitTypeMask(UNIT_MASK_MINION | UNIT_MASK_SUMMON | UNIT_MASK_GUARDIAN | UNIT_MASK_CONTROLABLE_GUARDIAN) ||
2498 GetScriptId() || GetAIName() == "SmartAI")
2499 {
2500 m_moveInLineOfSightStrictlyDisabled = false;
2501 m_moveInLineOfSightDisabled = false;
2502 return;
2503 }
2504
2505 if (IsTrigger() || IsCivilian() || GetCreatureType() == CREATURE_TYPE_NON_COMBAT_PET || IsCritter() || GetAIName() == "NullCreatureAI")
2506 {
2507 m_moveInLineOfSightDisabled = true;
2508 m_moveInLineOfSightStrictlyDisabled = true;
2509 return;
2510 }
2511
2512 bool nonHostile = true;
2513 if (FactionTemplateEntry const* factionTemplate = sFactionTemplateStore.LookupEntry(GetFaction()))
2514 if (factionTemplate->hostileMask || factionTemplate->enemyFaction[0] || factionTemplate->enemyFaction[1] || factionTemplate->enemyFaction[2] || factionTemplate->enemyFaction[3])
2515 nonHostile = false;
2516
2517 if (nonHostile)
2518 m_moveInLineOfSightDisabled = true;
2519 else
2520 m_moveInLineOfSightDisabled = false;
2521}

2523void Creature::SaveRespawnTime()

2525 if (IsSummon() || !m_spawnId || (m_creatureData && !m_creatureData->dbData))
2526 return;

2530
2531bool Creature::CanCreatureAttack(Unit const* victim, bool skipDistCheck) const
2532{
2533 if (!victim->IsInMap(this))
2534 return false;
2535
2536 if (!IsValidAttackTarget(victim))
2537 return false;
2538
2539 if (!victim->isInAccessiblePlaceFor(this))
2540 return false;
2541
2542 if (IsAIEnabled && !AI()->CanAIAttack(victim))
2543 return false;
2544
2545 // pussywizard: we cannot attack in evade mode
2546 if (IsInEvadeMode())
2547 return false;
2548
2549 // pussywizard: or if enemy is in evade mode
2550 if (victim->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && victim->ToCreature()->IsInEvadeMode())
2551 return false;
2552
2553 // cannot attack if is during 5 second grace period, unless being attacked
2554 if (m_respawnedTime && (GameTime::GetGameTime().count() - m_respawnedTime) < 5 && victim->getAttackers().empty())
2555 {
2556 return false;
2557 }
2558
2559 // if victim is in FD and we can't see that
2560 if (victim->HasUnitFlag2(UNIT_FLAG2_FEIGN_DEATH) && !CanIgnoreFeignDeath())
2561 {
2562 return false;
2563 }
2564
2565 if (!GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID().IsPlayer())
2566 {
2567 if (GetMap()->IsDungeon())
2568 return true;
2569
2570 // pussywizard: don't check distance to home position if recently damaged (allow kiting away from spawnpoint!)
2571 // xinef: this should include taunt auras
2572 if (!isWorldBoss() && (GetLastDamagedTime() > GameTime::GetGameTime().count() || HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_TAUNT)))
2573 return true;
2574 }
2575
2576 if (skipDistCheck)
2577 return true;
2578
2579 // xinef: added size factor for huge npcs
2580 float dist = std::min<float>(GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange() + GetObjectSize() * 2, 150.0f);
2581
2582 if (Unit* unit = GetCharmerOrOwner())
2583 return victim->IsWithinDist(unit, dist);
2584 else
2585 {
2586 // to prevent creatures in air ignore attacks because distance is already too high...
2587 if (GetMovementTemplate().IsFlightAllowed())
2588 return victim->IsInDist2d(&m_homePosition, dist);
2589 else
2590 return victim->IsInDist(&m_homePosition, dist);
2591 }
2592}
2593
2594CreatureAddon const* Creature::GetCreatureAddon() const
2595{
2596 if (m_spawnId)
2597 {
2598 if (CreatureAddon const* addon = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureAddon(m_spawnId))
2599 return addon;
2600 }
2601
2602 // dependent from difficulty mode entry
2603 return sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplateAddon(GetCreatureTemplate()->Entry);
2604}
2605
2606//creature_addon table
2607bool Creature::LoadCreaturesAddon(bool reload)
2608{
2609 CreatureAddon const* cainfo = GetCreatureAddon();
2610 if (!cainfo)
2611 return false;
2612
2613 if (cainfo->mount != 0)
2614 Mount(cainfo->mount);
2615
2616 if (cainfo->bytes1 != 0)
2617 {
2618 // 0 StandState
2619 // 1 FreeTalentPoints Pet only, so always 0 for default creature
2620 // 2 StandFlags
2621 // 3 StandMiscFlags
2622
2623 SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_STAND_STATE, uint8(cainfo->bytes1 & 0xFF));
2624 //SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_PET_TALENTS, uint8((cainfo->bytes1 >> 8) & 0xFF));
2625 SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_PET_TALENTS, 0);
2626 SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_VIS_FLAG, uint8((cainfo->bytes1 >> 16) & 0xFF));
2627 SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_ANIM_TIER, uint8((cainfo->bytes1 >> 24) & 0xFF));
2628
2634 if (CanHover())
2635 AddUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_HOVER);
2636 }
2637
2638 if (cainfo->bytes2 != 0)
2639 {
2640 // 0 SheathState
2641 // 1 Bytes2Flags
2642 // 2 UnitRename Pet only, so always 0 for default creature
2643 // 3 ShapeshiftForm Must be determined/set by shapeshift spell/aura
2644
2645 SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 0, uint8(cainfo->bytes2 & 0xFF));
2646 //SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 1, uint8((cainfo->bytes2 >> 8) & 0xFF));
2647 //SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 2, uint8((cainfo->bytes2 >> 16) & 0xFF));
2648 SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 2, 0);
2649 //SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 3, uint8((cainfo->bytes2 >> 24) & 0xFF));
2650 SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 3, 0);
2651 }
2652
2653 SetUInt32Value(UNIT_NPC_EMOTESTATE, cainfo->emote);
2654
2655 // Check if visibility distance different
2656 if (cainfo->visibilityDistanceType != VisibilityDistanceType::Normal)
2657 {
2658 SetVisibilityDistanceOverride(cainfo->visibilityDistanceType);
2659 }
2660
2661 //Load Path
2662 if (cainfo->path_id != 0)
2663 {
2664 if (sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_SET_ALL_CREATURES_WITH_WAYPOINT_MOVEMENT_ACTIVE))
2665 setActive(true);
2666 m_path_id = cainfo->path_id;
2667 }
2668
2669 if (!cainfo->auras.empty())
2670 {
2671 for (std::vector<uint32>::const_iterator itr = cainfo->auras.begin(); itr != cainfo->auras.end(); ++itr)
2672 {
2673 SpellInfo const* AdditionalSpellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(*itr);
2674 if (!AdditionalSpellInfo)
2675 {
2676 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature ({}) has wrong spell {} defined in `auras` field.", GetGUID().ToString(), *itr);
2677 continue;
2678 }
2679
2680 // skip already applied aura
2681 if (HasAura(*itr))
2682 {
2683 if (!reload)
2684 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Creature ({}) has duplicate aura (spell {}) in `auras` field.", GetGUID().ToString(), *itr);
2685
2686 continue;
2687 }
2688
2689 AddAura(*itr, this);
2690 LOG_DEBUG("entities.unit", "Spell: {} added to creature ({})", *itr, GetGUID().ToString());
2691 }
2692 }
2693
2694 return true;
2695}
