2711void Creature::ProhibitSpellSchool(SpellSchoolMask idSchoolMask, uint32 unTimeMs)
2712{
2713 for (uint8 i = SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL; i < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; ++i)
2714 {
2715 if (idSchoolMask & (1 << i))
2716 {
2717 m_ProhibitSchoolTime[i] = GameTime::GetGameTimeMS().count() + unTimeMs;
2718 }
2719 }
2720}
2721
2722bool Creature::IsSpellProhibited(SpellSchoolMask idSchoolMask) const
2723{
2724 for (uint8 i = SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL; i < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; ++i)
2725 {
2726 if (idSchoolMask & (1 << i))
2727 {
2728 if (m_ProhibitSchoolTime[i] >= GameTime::GetGameTimeMS().count())
2729 {
2730 return true;
2731 }
2732 }
2733 }
2734
2735 return false;
2736}
2737
2738void Creature::_AddCreatureSpellCooldown(uint32 spell_id, uint16 categoryId, uint32 end_time)
2739{
2740 CreatureSpellCooldown spellCooldown;
2741 spellCooldown.category = categoryId;
2742 spellCooldown.end = GameTime::GetGameTimeMS().count() + end_time;
2743 m_CreatureSpellCooldowns[spell_id] = std::move(spellCooldown);
2744}
2745
2746void Creature::AddSpellCooldown(uint32 spell_id, uint32 /*itemid*/, uint32 end_time, bool /*needSendToClient*/, bool /*forceSendToSpectator*/)
2747{
2748 SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(spell_id);
2749 if (!spellInfo)
2750 return;
2751
2752 // used in proc system, otherwise normal creature cooldown
2753 if (end_time)
2754 {
2755 _AddCreatureSpellCooldown(spellInfo->Id, 0, end_time);
2756 return;
2757 }
2758
2759 uint32 spellcooldown = spellInfo->RecoveryTime;
2760 uint32 categoryId = spellInfo->GetCategory();
2761 uint32 categorycooldown = categoryId ? spellInfo->CategoryRecoveryTime : 0;
2762 if (Player* modOwner = GetSpellModOwner())
2763 {
2764 modOwner->ApplySpellMod(spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_COOLDOWN, spellcooldown);
2765 modOwner->ApplySpellMod(spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_COOLDOWN, categorycooldown);
2766 }
2767
2768 SpellCategoryStore::const_iterator i_scstore = sSpellsByCategoryStore.find(categoryId);
2769 if (categorycooldown && i_scstore != sSpellsByCategoryStore.end())
2770 {
2771 for (SpellCategorySet::const_iterator i_scset = i_scstore->second.begin(); i_scset != i_scstore->second.end(); ++i_scset)
2772 {
2773 _AddCreatureSpellCooldown(i_scset->second, categoryId, categorycooldown);
2774 }
2775 }
2776 else if (spellcooldown)
2777 {
2778 _AddCreatureSpellCooldown(spellInfo->Id, 0, spellcooldown);
2779 }
2780}
2781
2782uint32 Creature::GetSpellCooldown(uint32 spell_id) const
2783{
2784 CreatureSpellCooldowns::const_iterator itr = m_CreatureSpellCooldowns.find(spell_id);
2785 if (itr == m_CreatureSpellCooldowns.end())
2786 return 0;
2787
2788 return itr->second.end > GameTime::GetGameTimeMS().count() ? itr->second.end - GameTime::GetGameTimeMS().count() : 0;
2789}
2790
2791bool Creature::HasSpellCooldown(uint32 spell_id) const
2792{
2793 CreatureSpellCooldowns::const_iterator itr = m_CreatureSpellCooldowns.find(spell_id);
2794 return (itr != m_CreatureSpellCooldowns.end() && itr->second.end > GameTime::GetGameTimeMS().count());
2795}

2797bool Creature::HasSpell(uint32 spellID) const
2798{
2799 uint8 i;
2800 for (i = 0; i < MAX_CREATURE_SPELLS; ++i)
2801 if (spellID == m_spells[i])
2802 break;
2803 return i < MAX_CREATURE_SPELLS; //broke before end of iteration of known spells
2804}

2816void Creature::GetRespawnPosition(float& x, float& y, float& z, float* ori, float* dist) const
2817{
2818 if (m_spawnId)
2819 {
2820 if (CreatureData const* data = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureData(m_spawnId))
2821 {
2822 x = data->posX;
2823 y = data->posY;
2824 z = data->posZ;
2825 if (ori)
2826 *ori = data->orientation;
2827 if (dist)
2828 *dist = data->wander_distance;
2829
2830 return;
2831 }
2832 }
2833
2834 // xinef: changed this from current position to home position, fixes world summons with infinite duration
2835 if (GetTransport())
2836 {
2837 x = GetPositionX();
2838 y = GetPositionY();
2839 z = GetPositionZ();
2840 if (ori)
2841 *ori = GetOrientation();
2842 }
2843 else
2844 {
2845 Position homePos = GetHomePosition();
2846 x = homePos.GetPositionX();
2847 y = homePos.GetPositionY();
2848 z = homePos.GetPositionZ();
2849 if (ori)
2850 *ori = homePos.GetOrientation();
2851 }
2852 if (dist)
2853 *dist = 0;
2854}

2863
2864void Creature::AllLootRemovedFromCorpse()
2865{
2866 if (loot.loot_type != LOOT_SKINNING && !IsPet() && GetCreatureTemplate()->SkinLootId && hasLootRecipient())
2867 {
2868 if (LootTemplates_Skinning.HaveLootFor(GetCreatureTemplate()->SkinLootId))
2869 {
2870 SetUnitFlag(UNIT_FLAG_SKINNABLE);
2871 }
2872 }
2873
2874 time_t now = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
2875 if (m_corpseRemoveTime <= now)
2876 {
2877 return;
2878 }
2879
2880 float decayRate = sWorld->getRate(RATE_CORPSE_DECAY_LOOTED);
2881 uint32 diff = uint32((m_corpseRemoveTime - now) * decayRate);
2882
2883 m_respawnTime -= diff;
2884
2885 // corpse skinnable, but without skinning flag, and then skinned, corpse will despawn next update
2886 if (loot.loot_type == LOOT_SKINNING)
2887 {
2888 m_corpseRemoveTime = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
2889 }
2890 else
2891 {
2892 m_corpseRemoveTime -= diff;
2893 }
2894}

2900
2901 uint16 level = target->ToUnit()->getLevel() + sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_WORLD_BOSS_LEVEL_DIFF);
2902 if (level < 1)
2903 return 1;
2904 if (level > 255)
2905 return 255;
2906 return uint8(level);
2907}

2932
2933uint32 Creature::GetVendorItemCurrentCount(VendorItem const* vItem)
2934{
2935 if (!vItem->maxcount)
2936 return vItem->maxcount;
2937
2938 VendorItemCounts::iterator itr = m_vendorItemCounts.begin();
2939 for (; itr != m_vendorItemCounts.end(); ++itr)
2940 if (itr->itemId == vItem->item)
2941 break;
2942
2943 if (itr == m_vendorItemCounts.end())
2944 return vItem->maxcount;
2945
2946 VendorItemCount* vCount = &*itr;
2947
2948 time_t ptime = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
2949
2950 if (time_t(vCount->lastIncrementTime + vItem->incrtime) <= ptime)
2951 {
2952 ItemTemplate const* pProto = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(vItem->item);
2953
2954 uint32 diff = uint32((ptime - vCount->lastIncrementTime) / vItem->incrtime);
2955 if ((vCount->count + diff * pProto->BuyCount) >= vItem->maxcount)
2956 {
2957 m_vendorItemCounts.erase(itr);
2958 return vItem->maxcount;
2959 }
2960
2961 vCount->count += diff * pProto->BuyCount;
2962 vCount->lastIncrementTime = ptime;
2963 }
2964
2965 return vCount->count;
2966}
2967
2968uint32 Creature::UpdateVendorItemCurrentCount(VendorItem const* vItem, uint32 used_count)
2969{
2970 if (!vItem->maxcount)
2971 return 0;
2972
2973 VendorItemCounts::iterator itr = m_vendorItemCounts.begin();
2974 for (; itr != m_vendorItemCounts.end(); ++itr)
2975 if (itr->itemId == vItem->item)
2976 break;
2977
2978 if (itr == m_vendorItemCounts.end())
2979 {
2980 uint32 new_count = vItem->maxcount > used_count ? vItem->maxcount - used_count : 0;
2981 m_vendorItemCounts.push_back(VendorItemCount(vItem->item, new_count));
2982 return new_count;
2983 }
2984
2985 VendorItemCount* vCount = &*itr;
2986
2987 time_t ptime = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
2988
2989 if (time_t(vCount->lastIncrementTime + vItem->incrtime) <= ptime)
2990 {
2991 ItemTemplate const* pProto = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(vItem->item);
2992
2993 uint32 diff = uint32((ptime - vCount->lastIncrementTime) / vItem->incrtime);
2994 if ((vCount->count + diff * pProto->BuyCount) < vItem->maxcount)
2995 vCount->count += diff * pProto->BuyCount;
2996 else
2997 vCount->count = vItem->maxcount;
2998 }
2999
3000 vCount->count = vCount->count > used_count ? vCount->count - used_count : 0;
3001 vCount->lastIncrementTime = ptime;
3002 return vCount->count;
3003}

3078 data.Initialize(MSG_MOVE_GRAVITY_CHNG, 64);
3079 data << GetPackGUID();

3081 m_movedByPlayer->ToPlayer()->SendMessageToSet(&data, false);
3082 return true;
3083 }
3084
3085 if (updateAnimationTier && IsAlive() && !HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ROOT) && !GetMovementTemplate().IsRooted())
3086 {
3087 if (IsLevitating())
3088 SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_ANIM_TIER, UNIT_BYTE1_FLAG_FLY);

3093 }
3094
3095 WorldPacket data(disable ? SMSG_SPLINE_MOVE_GRAVITY_DISABLE : SMSG_SPLINE_MOVE_GRAVITY_ENABLE, 9);
3096 data << GetPackGUID();
3097 SendMessageToSet(&data, false);

3249
3250float Creature::GetAggroRange(Unit const* target) const
3251{
3252 // Determines the aggro range for creatures
3253 // Based on data from wowwiki due to lack of 3.3.5a data
3254
3255 float aggroRate = sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO);
3256 if (aggroRate == 0)
3257 return 0.0f;
3258
3259 auto creatureLevel = target->getLevelForTarget(this);
3260 auto playerLevel = getLevelForTarget(target);
3261 int32 levelDiff = int32(creatureLevel) - int32(playerLevel);
3262
3263 // The maximum Aggro Radius is capped at 45 yards (25 level difference)
3264 if (levelDiff < -25)
3265 levelDiff = -25;
3266
3267 // The base aggro radius for mob of same level
3268 auto aggroRadius = GetDetectionRange();
3269 if (aggroRadius < 1)
3270 {
3271 return 0.0f;
3272 }
3273 // Aggro Radius varies with level difference at a rate of roughly 1 yard/level
3274 aggroRadius -= (float)levelDiff;
3275
3276 // detect range auras
3277 aggroRadius += GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECT_RANGE);
3278
3279 // detected range auras
3280 aggroRadius += target->GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECTED_RANGE);
3281
3282 // Just in case, we don't want pets running all over the map
3283 if (aggroRadius > MAX_AGGRO_RADIUS)
3284 aggroRadius = MAX_AGGRO_RADIUS;
3285
3286 // Minimum Aggro Radius for a mob seems to be combat range (5 yards)
3287 // hunter pets seem to ignore minimum aggro radius so we'll default it a little higher
3288 float minRange = IsPet() ? 10.0f : 5.0f;
3289 if (aggroRadius < minRange)
3290 aggroRadius = minRange;
3291
3292 return (aggroRadius * aggroRate);
3293}
3294
3295void Creature::UpdateMovementFlags()
3296{
3297 // Do not update movement flags if creature is controlled by a player (charm/vehicle)
3298 if (m_movedByPlayer)
3299 return;
3300
3301 CreatureTemplate const* info = GetCreatureTemplate();
3302 if (!info)
3303 return;
3304
3305 // Creatures with CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_NO_MOVE_FLAGS_UPDATE should control MovementFlags in your own scripts
3306 if (info->flags_extra & CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_NO_MOVE_FLAGS_UPDATE)
3307 return;
3308
3309 float ground = GetFloorZ();
3310
3311 bool canHover = CanHover();
3312 bool isInAir = (G3D::fuzzyGt(GetPositionZ(), ground + (canHover ? GetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_HOVERHEIGHT) : 0.0f) + GROUND_HEIGHT_TOLERANCE) || G3D::fuzzyLt(GetPositionZ(), ground - GROUND_HEIGHT_TOLERANCE)); // Can be underground too, prevent the falling
3313
3314 if (GetMovementTemplate().IsFlightAllowed() && isInAir && !IsFalling())
3315 {
3316 if (GetMovementTemplate().Flight == CreatureFlightMovementType::CanFly)
3317 SetCanFly(true);
3318 else
3319 SetDisableGravity(true);
3320
3321 if (!HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_HOVER))
3322 SetHover(false);
3323 }
3324 else
3325 {
3326 SetCanFly(false);
3327 SetDisableGravity(false);
3328 if (IsAlive() && (CanHover() || HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_HOVER)))
3329 SetHover(true);
3330 }
3331
3332 if (!isInAir)
3333 RemoveUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_FALLING);
3334
3335 bool Swim = false;
3336 LiquidData const& liquidData = GetLiquidData();
3337 switch (liquidData.Status)
3338 {
3339 case LIQUID_MAP_WATER_WALK:
3340 case LIQUID_MAP_IN_WATER:
3341 Swim = GetPositionZ() - liquidData.DepthLevel > GetCollisionHeight() * 0.75f; // Shallow water at ~75% of collision height
3342 break;
3343 case LIQUID_MAP_UNDER_WATER:
3344 Swim = true;
3345 break;
3346 default:
3347 break;
3348 }
3349
3350 SetSwim(CanSwim() && Swim);
3351}
3352
3353void Creature::SetObjectScale(float scale)
3354{
3355 Unit::SetObjectScale(scale);
3356
3357 float combatReach = DEFAULT_WORLD_OBJECT_SIZE;
3358
3359 if (CreatureModelInfo const* minfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureModelInfo(GetDisplayId()))
3360 {
3361 SetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_BOUNDINGRADIUS, (IsPet() ? 1.0f : minfo->bounding_radius) * scale);
3362 if (minfo->combat_reach > 0)
3363 combatReach = minfo->combat_reach;
3364 }
3365
3366 if (IsPet())
3367 combatReach = DEFAULT_COMBAT_REACH;
3368
3369 SetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_COMBATREACH, combatReach * scale);
3370}

3382 combatReach = minfo->combat_reach;
3383 }
3384
3385 if (IsPet())

3397void Creature::FocusTarget(Spell const* focusSpell, WorldObject const* target)
3398{
3399 // already focused
3400 if (_focusSpell)
3401 return;
3402
3403 _focusSpell = focusSpell;
3404
3405 SetGuidValue(UNIT_FIELD_TARGET, this == target ? ObjectGuid::Empty : target->GetGUID());
3406 if (focusSpell->GetSpellInfo()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_AI_DOESNT_FACE_TARGET))
3407 AddUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ROTATING);
3408
3409 // Set serverside orientation if needed (needs to be after attribute check)
3410 if (this == target && (movespline->Finalized() || GetMotionMaster()->GetCurrentMovementGeneratorType() == CHASE_MOTION_TYPE))
3411 SetFacingTo(GetOrientation());
3412 else
3413 SetInFront(target);
3414}

3416bool Creature::HasSpellFocus(Spell const* focusSpell) const
3417{
3418 if (isDead()) // dead creatures cannot focus
3419 {
3420 return false;
3421 }
3422
3423 return focusSpell ? (focusSpell == _spellFocusInfo.Spell) : (_spellFocusInfo.Spell || _spellFocusInfo.Delay);
3424}
3425
3426void Creature::ReleaseFocus(Spell const* focusSpell)
3427{
3428 // focused to something else
3429 if (focusSpell != _focusSpell)
3430 return;
3431
3432 _focusSpell = nullptr;
3433 if (Unit* victim = GetVictim())
3434 SetGuidValue(UNIT_FIELD_TARGET, victim->GetGUID());
3435 else
3436 SetGuidValue(UNIT_FIELD_TARGET, ObjectGuid::Empty);
3437
3438 if (focusSpell->GetSpellInfo()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_AI_DOESNT_FACE_TARGET))
3439 ClearUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ROTATING);
3440}
3441
3442float Creature::GetAttackDistance(Unit const* player) const
3443{
3444 float aggroRate = sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO);
3445
3446 if (aggroRate == 0)
3447 return 0.0f;
3448
3449 if (!player)
3450 return 0.0f;
3451
3452 uint32 playerLevel = player->getLevelForTarget(this);
3453 uint32 creatureLevel = getLevelForTarget(player);
3454
3455 int32 levelDiff = static_cast<int32>(playerLevel) - static_cast<int32>(creatureLevel);
3456
3457 // "The maximum Aggro Radius has a cap of 25 levels under. Example: A level 30 char has the same Aggro Radius of a level 5 char on a level 60 mob."
3458 if (levelDiff < -25)
3459 levelDiff = -25;
3460
3461 // "The aggro radius of a mob having the same level as the player is roughly 20 yards"
3462 float retDistance = 20.0f;
3463
3464 // "Aggro Radius varies with level difference at a rate of roughly 1 yard/level"
3465 // radius grow if playlevel < creaturelevel
3466 retDistance -= static_cast<float>(levelDiff);
3467
3468 if (creatureLevel + 5 <= sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL))
3469 {
3470 // detect range auras
3471 retDistance += static_cast<float>( GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECT_RANGE) );
3472
3473 // detected range auras
3474 retDistance += static_cast<float>( player->GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECTED_RANGE) );
3475 }
3476
3477 // "Minimum Aggro Radius for a mob seems to be combat range (5 yards)"
3478 if (retDistance < 5.0f)
3479 retDistance = 5.0f;
3480
3481 return (retDistance * aggroRate);
3482}
3483
3484bool Creature::IsMovementPreventedByCasting() const
3485{
3486 Spell* spell = m_currentSpells[CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL];
3487 // first check if currently a movement allowed channel is active and we're not casting
3488 if (spell && spell->getState() != SPELL_STATE_FINISHED && spell->IsChannelActive() && spell->GetSpellInfo()->IsActionAllowedChannel())
3489 {
3490 return false;
3491 }
3492
3493 if (HasSpellFocus())
3494 {
3495 return true;
3496 }
3497
3498 if (HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING))
3499 {
3500 return true;
3501 }
3502
3503 return false;
3504}

3568bool Creature::CanPeriodicallyCallForAssistance() const
3569{

3585uint32 Creature::GetRandomId(uint32 id1, uint32 id2, uint32 id3)
3586{
3587 uint32 id = id1;
3588 uint8 ids = 0;
3589
3590 if (id2)
3591 {
3592 ++ids;
3593 if (id3) ++ids;
3594 }
3595
3596 if (ids)
3597 {
3598 uint8 idNumber = urand(0, ids);
3599 switch (idNumber)
3600 {
3601 case 0:
3602 id = id1;
3603 break;
3604 case 1:
3605 id = id2;
3606 break;
3607 case 2:
3608 id = id3;
3609 break;
3610 }
3611 }
3612 return id;
3613}
